one of the best f2p experience i had
recommended
warframe is a very well made free to play 3rd person pve coop action game set in a futuristic version of our solar system currently in beta and it has been for more than a year but do not let that put you off this game deserves at least a moment of your time you take control of a tenno a member of a mysterious race of long forgotten warriors the name warframe refers to the suits of exoarmour used by the tenno in battle the idea for warframe grew from a 2008 game by digital extremes dark sector the two games share the same universe and there is some evidence to support the theory that dark sectors protagonist is still alive in some form in warframes far future missions in warframe come in several flavours extermination survival defence and boss battles are just a few of the challenges you can expect to face the levels are procedural generated from tile sets so even if the same level is played repeatedly there will be map variations every time although pvp does exist in the game conclave and a duelling room the main focus is pve 4 player squads versus all this grim future has to throw at them there is so much content in this game im only going to scratch the surface customisation is vast and varied with new content added frequently all the standard guns you would expect are here assault rifles pistols shotguns sniper rifles and much more bows bizarre energy weapons flame throwers and a huge amount of melee choices weapons and frames can be modded too need more health and shields no problem apply the mods to your frame and then level them up for more health and shields there are hundreds of mod cards to boost or add stats elemental damage mods can be mixed to create different effects and a refined melee combat system has been added recently there is no shortage of customisation in the looks department either colour palettes alternate helmets badges skins and a tonne of accessories looking good in warframe does come with a real world cost most of the cosmetic upgrades will require you to buy platinum of course warframes are different beyond their appearance each frame has 4 special powers bound to it these range from direct attacks to team heals mind control to invisibility team buffs and enemy debuffs the list goes on and on each warframe has different base stats all frames can run slide jump and wallrun there are plenty of hidden areas and shortcuts that can only be accessed by chaining together jumps and wallruns the graphics look great and really come alive during combat environments range from murky swamps to the divine radiance of the void the soundtrack and sound effects are also of a high standard weapons sound like they look and feel the drum heavy ost helps to keep the action pounding along and that first 10 seconds of music on the login screen will always make me think of the terminator theme another plus for wf character animations are fluid character physics are a bit floaty i have seen the handling of warframes compared to steering a boat but personally ive never had a problem with it and the at times wile e coyote like momentum there are downsides too this game is a time sink and the only way to avoid those long hours spent grinding is your money buy some plat and get that stuff instantly loads of my friends have quit playing when they find out about the 12hr wait on the parts needed to build a new warframe then the 3 day build time on the actual warframe again this has never been a big issue for me i could easily keep going for another 700 words more pros and cons explain more about the game and expand on those points ive mentioned but this is the bottom line warframe is a fantastic game that has done nothing but improve in the time ive played it
recommended

warframe was the best game i ever played thank you <3

its free just try it you lose nothing but time youd use to do something else thats probably stupid probably one of the better free to play games unlike most free to play games which restrict your experience without you paying them warframe pretty much offers nearly all of its content for free with the exception of purely cosmetic items and item slots which only serve you if you plan to collect a lot of itemscharacters the weapons and characters themselves can be earned without paying money and the best equipment is usually not available for real money anyway

one could easily say that warframe is a lacking game sporting limited amounts of story heavy grinding and being in beta for two years however the game feels incredibly good to play and has a great developer team which actually looks to players needs and wishes everything in the game which is not purely cosmetic or isnt an equipment slot can be farmed for for free and in addition to that you can trade for platinum the ingame currency you buy with real money in the trade chat allowing you to get even the things you need to pay for for free if you wish the customization in the game is great and the amounts of different and interesting weapons is very wide making it assured that everyone will have something to choose from the game isnt very hard but when you get to the very late game content it actually becomes quite challenging and increasingly difficult to the point of being close to impossible around the twohoursmark of the orokin void tower iv survival the game becomes better and better with every update and is becoming closer and closer to being complete with all the old placeholder stuff being reworked into something entirely awesome as the time goes so yes i do recommend this game it is a great timeeater but it is worth the play also now you can fly around with angel wings while wearing a suit with a tuxedo and banishing enemies to a different dimension if that is not cool nothing is

warframe is a very well made free to play 3rd person pve coop action game set in a futuristic version of our solar system currently in beta and it has been for more than a year but do not let that put you off this game deserves at least a moment of your time you take control of a tenno a member of a mysterious race of long forgotten warriors the name warframe refers to the suits of exoarmour used by the tenno in battle the idea for warframe grew from a 2008 game by digital extremes dark sector the two games share the same universe and there is some evidence to support the theory that dark sectors protagonist is still alive in some form in warframes far future missions in warframe come in several flavours extermination survival defence and boss battles are just a few of the challenges you can expect to face the levels are procedural generated from tile sets so even if the same level is played repeatedly there will be map variations every time although pvp does exist in the game conclave and a duelling room the main focus is pve 4 player squads versus all this grim future has to throw at them there is so much content in this game im only going to scratch the surface customisation is vast and varied with new content added frequently all the standard guns you would expect are here assault rifles pistols shotguns sniper rifles and much more bows bizarre energy weapons flame throwers and a huge amount of melee choices weapons and frames can be modded too need more health and shields no problem apply the mods to your frame and then level them up for more health and shields there are hundreds of mod cards to boost or add stats elemental damage mods can be mixed to create different effects and a refined melee combat system has been added recently there is no shortage of customisation in the looks department either colour palettes alternate helmets badges skins and a tonne of accessories looking good in warframe does come with a real world cost most of the cosmetic upgrades will require you to buy platinum of course warframes are different beyond their appearance each frame has 4 special powers bound to it these range from direct attacks to team heals mind control to invisibility team buffs and enemy debuffs the list goes on and on each warframe has different base stats all frames can run slide jump and wallrun there are plenty of hidden areas and shortcuts that can only be accessed by chaining together jumps and wallruns the graphics look great and really come alive during combat environments range from murky swamps to the divine radiance of the void the soundtrack and sound effects are also of a high standard weapons sound like they look and feel the drum heavy ost helps to keep the action pounding along and that first 10 seconds of music on the login screen will always make me think of the terminator theme another plus for wf character animations are fluid character physics are a bit floaty i have seen the handling of warframes compared to steering a boat but personally ive never had a problem with it and the at times wile e coyote like momentum there are downsides too this game is a time sink and the only way to avoid those long hours spent grinding is your money buy some plat and get that stuff instantly loads of my friends have quit playing when they find out about the 12hr wait on the parts needed to build a new warframe then the 3 day build time on the actual warframe again this has never been a big issue for me i could easily keep going for another 700 words more pros and cons explain more about the game and expand on those points ive mentioned but this is the bottom line warframe is a fantastic game that has done nothing but improve in the time ive played it

one could easily say that warframe is a lacking game sporting limited amounts of story heavy grinding and being in beta for two years however the game feels incredibly good to play and has a great developer team which actually looks to players needs and wishes everything in the game which is not purely cosmetic or isnt an equipment slot can be farmed for for free and in addition to that you can trade for platinum the ingame currency you buy with real money in the trade chat allowing you to get even the things you need to pay for for free if you wish the customization in the game is great and the amounts of different and interesting weapons is very wide making it assured that everyone will have something to choose from the game isnt very hard but when you get to the very late game content it actually becomes quite challenging and increasingly difficult to the point of being close to impossible around the twohoursmark of the orokin void tower iv survival the game becomes better and better with every update and is becoming closer and closer to being complete with all the old placeholder stuff being reworked into something entirely awesome as the time goes so yes i do recommend this game it is a great timeeater but it is worth the play also now you can fly around with angel wings while wearing a suit with a tuxedo and banishing enemies to a different dimension if that is not cool nothing is

edited for update reasons alright so i have decided to change my review since i realised that it became very old and people need to know more about this game rather then just knowing that you are a ninja in space alright so lets begin warframe is a free to play game now it does have a secondary currency named platinum which is used to either purchase weapons speed up building processpurchase warframesand cosmetic items now just hold on for a second and listen this game manages to make this currency obatinable using trading and those warframes and weapons that you can purchase using the currency can be obtained without having to use the currency and this is when the foundry which is basically where you craft comes into use now the primary currency is called credits and that currency is used to purchase blueprints for the weapon or the warframe that you wish to have now as you guessed you have to wait now some can argue that this forces you to buy but actually it doesnt it encourages you to level up your stuff and get credits and xp while its done the timing for weapons ranges from 1224 hours while warframes take 3 days  now the trading system is excellent but the trading community are just full of s and s  but its better to join a clan because they can help you in trading alot and now this gets us to the coop part and to me this is the most important part in warframe since first it claims it is a coop game therefore i should judge it based on that and to be honest the coop system is fantastic now that doesnt mean you cant play solo they actually give you the option to play solo but the coop is so nice since the community excluding the trading section is very friendly and you will find tons of people who are willing to assist you and you have to try and socialaize in warframe since having a team of 4 organized people each one knows his role and follows it is better then 65 player clan running and gunning this makes the game perfect for playing with friends but the biggest thing that makes you want to purchase platinum is slots for your frames and weapons now i know this isnt a good thing but comparing to how much they have given us for free its kind of something they require to get their funding and as i said the secondary currency is obttainable in the game cosmetics used to be with platinum only but with the introduction of this new trader who i forgot his name xd you can buy cosmetic stuff for credits and a third currency that is easily obtained in the game now this brings us to the last thing which is color palettes which from my info are only obbtainable using platinum but in alot of occasions developers just hand out free color palettes and the developers are amazing they listen to the community and will never hesitate to put their ideas into prespective and are very active using livestreams and all kinds of communication on the forums nevertheless warframe is one of the greatest f2p titles out there and this review definitley didnt cover even 30% of the game so i really encourage you to try it out and explore it for yourself  1010 would break fingers again

edited for update reasons alright so i have decided to change my review since i realised that it became very old and people need to know more about this game rather then just knowing that you are a ninja in space alright so lets begin warframe is a free to play game now it does have a secondary currency named platinum which is used to either purchase weapons speed up building processpurchase warframesand cosmetic items now just hold on for a second and listen this game manages to make this currency obatinable using trading and those warframes and weapons that you can purchase using the currency can be obtained without having to use the currency and this is when the foundry which is basically where you craft comes into use now the primary currency is called credits and that currency is used to purchase blueprints for the weapon or the warframe that you wish to have now as you guessed you have to wait now some can argue that this forces you to buy but actually it doesnt it encourages you to level up your stuff and get credits and xp while its done the timing for weapons ranges from 1224 hours while warframes take 3 days  now the trading system is excellent but the trading community are just full of s and s  but its better to join a clan because they can help you in trading alot and now this gets us to the coop part and to me this is the most important part in warframe since first it claims it is a coop game therefore i should judge it based on that and to be honest the coop system is fantastic now that doesnt mean you cant play solo they actually give you the option to play solo but the coop is so nice since the community excluding the trading section is very friendly and you will find tons of people who are willing to assist you and you have to try and socialaize in warframe since having a team of 4 organized people each one knows his role and follows it is better then 65 player clan running and gunning this makes the game perfect for playing with friends but the biggest thing that makes you want to purchase platinum is slots for your frames and weapons now i know this isnt a good thing but comparing to how much they have given us for free its kind of something they require to get their funding and as i said the secondary currency is obttainable in the game cosmetics used to be with platinum only but with the introduction of this new trader who i forgot his name xd you can buy cosmetic stuff for credits and a third currency that is easily obtained in the game now this brings us to the last thing which is color palettes which from my info are only obbtainable using platinum but in alot of occasions developers just hand out free color palettes and the developers are amazing they listen to the community and will never hesitate to put their ideas into prespective and are very active using livestreams and all kinds of communication on the forums nevertheless warframe is one of the greatest f2p titles out there and this review definitley didnt cover even 30% of the game so i really encourage you to try it out and explore it for yourself  1010 would break fingers again

alrighty so where to begin youre a cryogenically frozen and now reawakened space ninja with the ability to manipulate many properties of space and time at will whos supposed goal is to maintain the balance of the solar system which has fallen into chaos the year isnt given but its sometime in the far distant future lets get down to business the game itself is a third person shooter with you having a primary something that generally requires two hands like a rifle or a bow & arrow a secondary onehanded or dual wielded pistols or throwing stars and a melee weapon positives creative variety of playable classes warframes massive variety of weapon types total of three weapon slots primary secondary melee evolving lore the devs are constantly adding in more and more content and as they do so they add in more backstory to the game and its factions variety of mission types exterminate capture survival etc a nice amount of customization primary in coloring is present in the game free to play pay to look good fairly easy to trade with other players to get the realmoney currency negatives massive grindwall its earned the nickname warfarm because of it inverted difficulty curve game starts difficult then gets easier as you get more gear devs are working on correcting this platinum the realmoney currency is required for warframe and weapon slots which new players start out with very few of im thoroughly addicted to this game and ill always come back to it its possible to get all of the ingame currencies for free but ill confess to having $70 spent on my account but these guys work hard they have weekly livestreams to update players on their progress and deserve every penny

was really poor there were twothree rooms connected in different combination to make it look bigger almost the same type of enemies grinding with almost the same weapons all the time but that was two years ago thanks to regullary released updates game is now huge and i really mean it and it just keeps getting bigger and constant updates make you wait impatiently for next ones preventing boredom secondly game is build not only by devs but also by players that have huge impact on digital extremes developers decisions about what to do next its like community is part of the studio third thing nice community ive played a lot of games and this one has really good community compared to other games of course there are some morons that will try to ruin your experience but there always has to be few of them right next thing is huge variety of equipment you play your way theres no such thing as best equipment there there are plenty of choices to match your playstyle lastly its true f2p model there are no things that are neccessary for good equipment that are only availible through real money well slots for your warframes characters and weapons are limited at first but you can always sell few things to players to get enough money platinum to get slots or simply just buy platinum once when youll receive 75% discount its really cheap then and i guarantee you wont regret it otherwise despite peoples claims for it being a pay2win game youd be terribly mistaken all frames are obtainable through regular play you can choose to invest real money if you so wish to get the frames you wish or you may choose to get it as you would with any other game its not a mmo more of a 4player coop third person action game allowing you to take control of a warframe refered too as tenno the race controlling it basically youre a space ninja you get to zip line run along walls back flip walls slash a big  sword and generally kick  there are three factions corpus grineer and infested infested the infested are mostly melee based with strange aliencorrupted creatures that can inflict deadly poisons or maul you to death corpus the corpus are like the evil science type guys these have moa robots practically guns with legs they mostly use lazer weapons not only that there are melee corpus who make use of electric prods nasty as well as the annoying shield spray robots which can repair the shields of foes around it grineer the grineer unlike the corpus have more standard type weapons less futuristic they also have melee uses who try to slice you youll find them doing a lot of damage if they successfully land a hit originally this game had started off as something so very small with only a few frames loki excalibur volt rhino and mag it slowly started growing and becoming so much more really basic levels and basic movement and have strongly benefitted from constant player feedback improving the game with every update the game is extremely responsive however be prepared to get a hand ache after hours of play with how much you need to keep moving to avoid enemies and help allies one minor issue for me is that this game lacks any cover mechanic enemies can cover but you are unable to blocking is in the game but it also feels rather pointless since ive found myself in little to no situations where it was actually neccesary or helpful it is also assigned by default to mouse button 4 if youre old fashioned like me and have a mouse with only 3 buttons you may need to assign it to a spot on your keyboard the game is simple the graphics amazing it works on my really substandard pc with a graphics card as basic as an asus eah6450 with a simple godawful amd athlon 64 processor 3200 199 ghz and 300gb of ram running winxp sp3 yes this pc is about as old as the hills you may not be able to play with friends with a pc like this but you sure as hell can play the game at well over 30fps and as far as im concerned that is absolutely astonishing considering many other games with worse graphics than this run about as fast as a snale on salt do i recommend this game hell yes i would recommend it to everyone even if you wouldnt like it try it anyway since its free to play and you really just cant complain ive had more hours out of this beauty than i have out of any aaa $6000 piece of over hyped trash

warframe is a fast paced f2p game that rewards long time players over buying ingame items warframe may seem hard at first to play but the game only gets more easy the longer you stick with it even offering some of the best ingame weapons for free during events that are more often than you think and special dates like christmaseaster etc warframe has a massive amount of content to explore including framesweapons and even pets the way to aquire these items is through collecting materials throughout the solar system and at first glance it would give the impression of too much grinding but it encurages you to explore and seek out new planets and rewards warframe does have a paid for currency that allows you to buy nearly anything in the game but what warframe has that others games dont is that you can trade for that currency with rewards you have earned by playing the game warframe does have problems though with some of the best content being far to hard to get even for long time players and balancing on weapons and frames is a very rocky path with some of the best content being reduced to mastery fodder overall warframe is not for everyone but is lots of fun to play and is updated every wensday with new content and provides lots of enterainment its a must play f2p game

often described as a pay to win game i found that not to be the case warframe is a third person shooter that is easy to pick up and rewards players who put time and effort into the game the initial learning curve is set quite high but can be made easier with help from the rather polite online community missions can seem repetitive at times but the constant addition of new content and game mechanics make warframe always feel fresh being still only in beta there are a few minor bugs that stop it from being one of the top free to play games around these issues however hardly detract from the game itself and are only noticible because the rest of the game feels so polished overall warframe is a genuinely good game that has a lot of things going for it i look forward to the developers live release and whatever additional changes accompany it

in the past when i first tried this game it was awful each level was long difficult and had very little variety it was so mindnumbingly boring that warframe became difficult to play each level was the same layout with a slightly different skin on it one would play a level and the next level would be the exact same thing but with ice ohhh exciting except it wasnt at all since then warframe has improved a tremendous amount and is legitimately rather fun to play finding new areas and little hidden sections while exploring a map is fun and often results in some more or less useful resources the flow of the game is alot smoother and enemies do not indefinitely respawn which made the game much harder before ive had some pretty great times with warframe and its much better than it once was though the copy and paste level layouts are still the same it doesnt feel as empty and dull as it did in the past two comments that i must make however is the amount of time it takes to gather resources needed to advance in strength and level and playing with a controller the controller layout is absolutely horrid and you must redo it all and test with it before you can find something that works the sensitivity is way too high and the button layout is simply difficult and hard to understand overall i give this game a 710 its a good game but players that dont like alot of grinding and hate some repentition will quickly get bored of it

all i can say about this one is that i am shocked that a game like this one is free to play actually i can really see myself spending money on this game however like any free to play game it is packed full of micro transactions making it so you can buy the things you want however this game seems more generous in that aspect you can either buy it with real money or you can keep playing and earn credits in the game to aquire the same things that people would buy with their own cash the graphics in this game are top notch as well as the overall gameplay the game has been built so you can experience this game alone or with your friends and random people online who would wish to accompany you on your quests this game is very much worth looking into if you are in anyway intrested in a futuristic cenario which takes place in space the game on top of looking good also seems like it is willing to offer a lot of gameplay both through many planets and objectives through the solar system as well as replayability to either find resources to rebuild your character or just replaying a map as a newly built character it seems you can build your character to either be a spectre in the shadows taking enemies out without anyone knowing you were even in the area or a blood lusting banshee screaming through and leaving death in your wake however if this was too long one word to sum this game up really space ninjas go play it

warframe is an action game in which you control a warframe a robot ninjaesque character with a specific set of 4 abilities that are unique to that warframe at the time of writing there are 22 warframes to choose from but you have a limited amount of slots to keep these warframes in unfortunately to unlock more slots you have to play real world money but provided you have a job you do have a job right you wont go bankrupt from this there are multiple types of missions ranging from assassinations to exterminations to mobile defense you can play solo or with up to 3 other people and you can drop in or drop out at any time playing warframe with a group of friends is seriously some of the most fun you will have in a free to play game but playing solo isnt that great luckily if you have no friends you can join random people online so you never have to worry about going solo unless you want to but why would you everything in warframe requires resources which can be obtained from different planets if you want one resource in particular youll have to go to a planet that contains that resource because they differ from planet to planet in order to get parts to get a new warframe however youll have to farm the boss of the planet and while it can be a chore it is alleviated a little bit if youre farming with friends or at least with other people for a free to play game warframe has a lot of content and a pretty fair market system the only thing you have to pay money for are cosmetics and have no effect on the game whatsoever everything else can be obtained for free in conclusion warframe is a very fun free to play game that increases exponentially in value if you have some friends with you while it can be a grind sometimes and a little repetitive this game is definitely worth your time and if you can grab some friends youll probably lose some sleep playing this game and hey its free so what do you have to lose download warframe and try it out you wont be dissapointed gameplay 455 graphics 45 story 35 replayability 455 sound 45 value 55 overall a very strong recommendation this might just be the best free to play game out there

warframe and the negative and positive things about it gameplay the gameplay of warframe well its alright not that bad if i am to say the gameplay can be fun because there are several ways to play it in you can do the missions ingame quickly by rushing it with teammates or go slowly throughout your missions there are various places to explore within the game with missions and neutral areas you can travel throughout the entire universe visit every planet there is and even its neutral social base the tenno platform there is a variability within designing things although they cost most of the time color packs will cost you platinum which is an ingame credit gotten by buying it color packs forms and design you can design an entire guild base with it developing slowly by having everyone of your guild working together to finish everything the base of the guild is quite huge and grand it will keep you occupied the color packs can be bought later on but the starter pack of colors will give you a bit to work with for the time and design your warframe weapons banners and added customisations multiplayer gameplay in warframe there is a multiplayer platform in which you can actually go from 4 towards 7 teammates in total you can rush a lot of missions or have more difficult fights within other missions there are several survival missions or control missions there is also the defense system in which you and your teammates will have to defend something in the mission all in all the gameplay might have its bugs sometimes with disconnecting and reconnecting every now and then but its worth the while weaponry in this game there is a huge variability of weapons to choose from there is the primary weapon that can be a rifle sniper shotgun or bow the secondary weapon that can be a pistol two pistols or more forms of smaller guns then there is the meele weapon the weapon that will help you in a lot of situations and is one of the few most overpowered weapons in the game there is a variability of what kind of weapon you can get but there is also the negative side of it where you have to buy a lot of them with platinum credits or by farming and creating which will also keep you occupied note customisation will still be there warframes warframes are the characters that you will be using within the game and will be able to design and customise you can add several colors or mods to your warframe sadly warframe spots need to be bought but youll get a few to use from playing the game for a long time the start of the game will give you a good choice of three warframes that you can pick to start with in which youll have to take the best choice for yourself a normal warframe can be upgraded from normal to prime after doing some challenging missions you can upgrade it with new parts all in all the warframe system will keep you occupied enough to play it for a long time until you grow sick of it all mods mods are addons in the game that will keep you occupied to customise what you want your weapons to do andor your warframes to do you can add damage elemental effects or more within the game with mods you can also level mods by adding and comparing mods to each of them so they become more powerful and make the gameplay more fun for you all in all rating all in all the game has some negative and positive things positive gameplay graphics variability of weapons creativity exploration ingame customisation occupation throughout the gameplay variability of warframes negative requires platinum in a lot of situations will be taking a lot of time for constructions might get on your nerves from time to time vote 910 would get anytime

warframe and the negative and positive things about it gameplay the gameplay of warframe well its alright not that bad if i am to say the gameplay can be fun because there are several ways to play it in you can do the missions ingame quickly by rushing it with teammates or go slowly throughout your missions there are various places to explore within the game with missions and neutral areas you can travel throughout the entire universe visit every planet there is and even its neutral social base the tenno platform there is a variability within designing things although they cost most of the time color packs will cost you platinum which is an ingame credit gotten by buying it color packs forms and design you can design an entire guild base with it developing slowly by having everyone of your guild working together to finish everything the base of the guild is quite huge and grand it will keep you occupied the color packs can be bought later on but the starter pack of colors will give you a bit to work with for the time and design your warframe weapons banners and added customisations multiplayer gameplay in warframe there is a multiplayer platform in which you can actually go from 4 towards 7 teammates in total you can rush a lot of missions or have more difficult fights within other missions there are several survival missions or control missions there is also the defense system in which you and your teammates will have to defend something in the mission all in all the gameplay might have its bugs sometimes with disconnecting and reconnecting every now and then but its worth the while weaponry in this game there is a huge variability of weapons to choose from there is the primary weapon that can be a rifle sniper shotgun or bow the secondary weapon that can be a pistol two pistols or more forms of smaller guns then there is the meele weapon the weapon that will help you in a lot of situations and is one of the few most overpowered weapons in the game there is a variability of what kind of weapon you can get but there is also the negative side of it where you have to buy a lot of them with platinum credits or by farming and creating which will also keep you occupied note customisation will still be there warframes warframes are the characters that you will be using within the game and will be able to design and customise you can add several colors or you can pick to start with in which youll have to take the best choice for yourself a normal warframe can be upgraded from normal to prime after doing some challenging missions you can upgrade it with warframe is a free online rpg on a miniature scale that is played in a browser like internet explorer or firefox the graphics have not evolved or look like they have been upgraded since 1996 it does not have the saving grace of being an e type of game for little kids either even though the graphics are kiddy type at first look you might think that warframe is merely stupid and childish but the underlying deceptiveness of this chat based experience is not apparent right away this is a game that looks like it is for 7 year olds in reality its far from it it does not carry a warning to parents or have a date of birth filter on it by being free to play the game circumvents the requirements that supposedly protect kids from adult content even though one shouldnt judge game developers by what the players have done with their online game at some point the developers do have to acknowledge what is being done with the user created content and deal with it in a responsible fashion players chat freely about real life and more adult content unsuitable for minors takes place that needs to be addressed with this game

recommended
warframe is a free to play tps  hack n slash coop game with stealth and parkour elements in it the player becomes one of the tenno space ninjas awakened from a long slumber who control powerful suits known as warframes which provide different abilities and allow them to tackle on dangerous jobs from lotus the graphics are just incredible each location has their own design style the environments are shiny and rich in details while the special effects are just plain beautiful the only downside might be the fact that the last one can be a little bit too distracting at times and hard to see through during a fight in the sound department the music is appriopriate to the situation speeds up when in a fight for example and whatever plays in the background is usually the theme of the faction youre fighting against though it can get overriden by the boss theme if someone like that appears the sound effects arent anything special but they are appriopriate in the sound department the each faction and most locations get their unique music tunes which also change according to the situations intensifies when youre in a fight calms down when you werent detected yet the voice acting is also really good even if a bit scarce the gameplay consists of you and up to three other players deploying on a mission and completing a specific objective like killing all enemies or capturing important targets while moving through randomlygenerated rooms you get to use between three weapons  primary secondary and melee which can be of many different types like shotguns rifles pistols shurikens swords axes  as well as an assortment of movement options including but not limited to sprinting sliding wallrunning etc you can also attack enemies while performing any of those maneuvers giving you a large degree of freedom as to how and when to move in and strike as far as stealth elements go you can obviously use cover to keep yourself out of sight of enemies you can also use silent weapons like bows and shurikens to take them out from a distance or sneak up behind them and perform an instakill stealth execution the mechanics are very solid and its fun slicing stuff down there is also the archwing and its own missions where you move in nogravity using the eponymous mechanical wings shooting down foes akin to a space shooter while it isnt as diverse as the standard gamemode it is a good change of pace from time to time not to mention even more awesome the amount of equipment types of environments and missions you can encounter is staggering the diversity is what keeps it from getting too stale another good thing is that the multiplayer functions pretty well  even with high ping you will notice an obvious delay but it wont impact your experience or general gameplay that much i think this is it for the pros so lets start counting out the cons the game is still quite obviously a glorified grind to get better stuff fortunately most of the time its somewhat fun to play speaking about multiplayer if the hosts computer lags horribly due to all the stuff going on in the game you can expect your gameplay to be similarly laggy with everything flash stepping all over the place another bad thing is the fact that enemies are horrendously stupid performing a stealth execution together with screams of pain does not itch the rest of the guards five meters ahead to look behind themselves you can snipe someone with a bow and no one will find anything particularly weird in a ragdolling corpse going halfway across the room they also tend to take cover at not exactly the best spots or forget that you just sped right past them and still sit there waiting in cover just being covered from the wrong direction harder missions only strengthen the enemies stats together with spawning elites more often and sometimes new types of enemies also another thing is that the game requires a lot of grinding to even get moderately powerful at the beginning youre going to struggle to complete the missions that arent the absolute simplest of all since you dont have much resources to manufacture new stuff and the starting equipment is very weak and even if you do get strong weapons theyre not going to be powerful enough with a good assortment of highrank mods for them to customize their damage output of course if you have a friend whos been playing the game for quite some time and is willing to help you out in getting started this becomes a bit less of an issue the amount of slots you get for equipment is also very limited while it isnt so bad with weapon and sentinel slots you get only two warframe slots for starters kind of limiting your options as to how many roles you can fill in a team you really need more slots to be able to do something besides one or two things the last thing is the fact that the game is pretty glitchy objects can spawn at wrong places due to random generator just messing up or you can land outside the map fall into the void and be forced to revive due to a collision detection glitch or a lag spike and this isnt an uncommon occurence it happened to me three times  overall this is a grindy and harsh at the beginning but very fun game once you get far enough you should check it out if you dont mind a sluggish beginning especially if youve got more experienced friends who can help you get running

this is collected from opinions of more than 10 people with whom i have played the game extensively dont believe the hour count games welloptimized and stable for me so i leave it running in background very often i have around 100 hours of gameplay in it so far maybe little less 3rd try jesus this game is hard to review its not a shooter so dont expect that this is a diablostyle game a world of rng loot showers grind lots of content and indepth character and equipment customization its pros include  lots of content like a huge amount hundreds of mods for equipment 150 weapons 20 warframes each with unique and interesting style and abilities and almost all ugly as  hundreds of missions unlocks a bunch of bosses 4 enemy factions story quests and a  dog yes there is even a pet system for some reason wtf i dont know  pretty lights welloptimized especially for nvidia and extrapretty graphics hd textures lots of options physx particles that are wholly misused and spam the screen while having no gameplay enhancing purpose but hey all this looks really colourful and pretty  good developer constant updates all the time responsive to feedback professional and passionate those guys know what they are doing and can be trusted to keep improving the game it is getting better overall with updates though they made a few mistakes along the way but when they set out to improve a particular area they usually succeed and deliver what the players ask for  great lore unique and mysterious lore set this game apart unfortunately there isnt much of it maybe they are saving it up for the new story quest system they added in u14  enormous equipment customization this is the main skill of the game  making a good build there are hundreds maybe already over a thousand different mods and you can put 8 on a piece of equipment this system is very good but is unfortnately plaigued by f2p curse i will mention it in cons  loot its like torchlight but with an overtheshoulder perspective tons of loot and rewards all showering you in a spectacular fireworks of colours and sparkles if you like loot you will like warframe its cons are  its not a shooter it requires no skill whatsoever success is determined entirely by rng its all in levels equipment and % unless you count aiming as a criteria for skillbased gameplay this game s only skill is making a roll at the right time to negate knockdown everything else is rng  technically same as above but its so big that it deserves a point of its own abilities are rng as well they are the second major combat tool after guns and they require energy to use that does not renegerate but drops from enemies randomly its incredibly infuriating for people like me who are very very unlucky in games i am pretty much either forced to use just guns or the efficiency build which is very restrictive for some warframes this is a terrible decision and i am baffled that they still havent even put a mod in that disables the energy orb pickups but gives you a potent energy recharge instead  f2p curse up until you have a potato a paid item that is incredibly difficult to get for free you dont have a choice with equipment customization every equipment item has the nonpotato build that you must use and cant deviate from  there is a polarity system that requires you to relevel items to make them able to have more mods leveling items in warframe is a giant chore and really frustrating and not fun the first time you get mastery from them so it helps a but but later you are just using the thing for ages despite being sick of it just to get to rank 30 releveling should happen at 23 times the current rate for it to be an enjoyable mechanic but now its awful and its one of the major downsides of the game  rng everything in warframe is controlled by rng roll the dice is the second name for this game consequently if you arent lucky you will have a bad time unless you manage to get some good friends who are lucky and can help you out which is what i did when i need to farm something really rare i just go with some friends who are lucky and i usually get it but never with randoms or alone no matter how much i try this is rng and welcome to jackass  enemy scaling is mmorpgstyle they scale with damage and health and they scale hard not special abilities new ai rules and such but just enormous hp and 1hks needless to say this does nothing for the appetite  enemies are games biggest gameplay issue they have different attacks sure but they are mostly noninteractive and completely nonreactive if an enemy can pull you it will pull you regardless of you being immune or behind cover further the spawn compositions are static and not reactive either and theres no significant differences between both enemy looks and their stats all in all the enemies are completely noninteractive all you can do with them is ragdoll them and kill them thats it neither their ai responds to player actions nor their spawns nor their states  level design levels are comprised of randomly arranged rooms each of which dont benefit the level in any way like forevener here told me and he is very much correct in that regard the game suffers from levels being completely linear theres no reason to consider the room ahead cuz you have to go through it anyway furthermore theres no reason to explore rooms and use the parkour it is not a good combat strategy and chests outside of void do not give good enough rewards for exploring each room thoroughly levels do not affect flow of combat and gameplay ok that covers all this game is really difficult to review theres a lot there and it is being constantly updated take a look the start might be rough but stick around play with some nice veterans theyll help you out and you can find your fun the gameplay may suffer from rng and enemy design resulting in lack of skill but it makes up for it with content and the variety in which the damage may be pumped out even if there is never thought required for it or nothing to make you think before shooting if nothing else where else can you grow a ing space dog

where to start with warframe well the whole space ninja promotions are very well deserved the lore is cool it looks beautiful for a f2p game and the gameplay is solid and very satisfying however there are some things that can irk and even push away new players if they arent prepared for it first the good stuff the first major thing is that its free to play meaning no purchase to play this thing no need to explain that this game is gorgeous seriously one of the best looking f2p games out there the designs of all the enemies weapons and player characters are also extremely cool looking for those who are into it the game has a pretty good upgrade system you can specialize your character and weapons with a variety of different upgrades for maximum efficency there are a whole bunch of missions to do so you wont have a lack in content for some time also the dev team is really good with updates getting them out very quickly the gameplay is most likely the best part parkouring around the area fighting with gunkatamixture of guns and melee weapons and having 4 different abilities for each character at your disposal the coop is also very good a great game to play with friends now there might be more but overall its a very good game but i would hurt myself if i didnt mention the bad stuff this game acts a lot like raiding in mmos at endgame if you play with strangers most will expect you to be fully decked out with the right mods and weapons this can get frustrating as ive had instances where people would leave because i didnt have the right mod setupmore of a personal gripe but something good to know if you plan on going completely f2p with this game expect a  ton of grinding you basically have to build everything so that means farming for resources and waiting for the item to be built to put this into perspective building a weapon takes about 24 hoursmaybe 12 i cant seem to remember and building a character takes about 3 days this game can be very daunting when first getting in the tutorial helps with gameplay but navigating the map and understanding what does what is left out my suggestion is to go onto youtube and look up some usermade tutorials two youtubers id recommend are mike b for his crash course in warframe videos which mainly help with better understanding your characters and mogamu who does the same thing though he takes closer looks at the weapons and whether or not theyre worth your time both are great for getting a headstart in how you want to play all in all this is a fantastic game the main problems i have with it can be easily solved with patience and research before you jump right in you should at least try this out since you wont be losing money in the process
recommended
this game is a fantastic mmotpsrpg you take the role of a tenno a being who has been in stasis for a very long time and attempt to bring balance back to the solar system guided by a mysterious entity known as the lotus you seek to survive and thrive in this instancebased coop mmo graphics running max graphics  physx the in game graphics engine is absolutely gorgeous from high bloom and glorius physx particles to the animations of the movements of all beings scifi seems extremely realistic without setting a ridiculous bar for whats necessary to play the game all of the warframe abilities have satisfying amounts of graphical work done and with the newest update npc voices also have 3d moving portraits in a very starcraftesque manner other than some minor graphical bugs such as a vent grate floating a couple inches off the floor everything looks very well polished some people may feel that the bloom is just too much for them and luckily there is an option to turn it off if so desired gameplay moving around in a warframe feels very fluid and natural and as a member of the design council i can vouch for des continued efforts at making this even more natural where possible wall running scaling jumping sliding rolling all seem very well mocapped and only at very few points in the game does movement become an issue such as getting stuck behind a pipe or such combat feels just as natural as well while there is no snap to cover system being able to switch shoulders makes for easy adjusting guns feel adequate in their power and recoil with some weapons like revolvers kicking much more than a light assault rifle as they should ammo is never truly a problem if played well but can become a concern for those that prefer to use bows or snipers as their ammo drops are fairly low understandably bullet based weapons are hitscan while energy and heavy projectile weapons will exhibit travel times but will not have drop associated with them melee weapons feel realtively fluid but seem somewhat weak this aspect however is getting a major overhaul soon and from what ive seen will be vastly improved warframe abilities are what bring a third dimension sometimes literally to combat in warframe no one frame is terrible compared to the others and those that feel underpowered are being looked at constantly for more reworking and balancing each frame is specialized to fulfill a certain role as such they wil cater to different mission types the highly mobile and damaging volt is much better at sabotage missions compared to the tanky cc based frost who is much better at defending than attacking this being said through the mod system warframes take on progression theres no reason that volt cant be defensive and frost the frontline attacker early on it wont matter too much which frames come into a game but down the road in the harder levels teams must be equipped to handle the right kinds of scenarios and enemies lest they face a constant uphill and sometimes impossible objective playing with others comes relatively easily in the game through either simply setting the game mode to online which makes it public or through asking around on the chat tab dedicated for such use for the most part the community in game is positive and helping towards its players although there will always be the occaisional sour apple in the bunch while there is an ingame comm system for voice chat in a squad i have never been a big fan of it opting instead for a thihrd party system due to voice clarity issues clans are a major part of the game and have over the past 5 patches been steadily improving these hubs serve not only just as a group of people but also as a home zone known as the dojo where players can practice fighting each other along with their freerunning skills and can unlock advanced weaponsframes through clan research this is also the place in which trade is conducted trading is still in its infancy for warframe having been released only a couple major updates ago the only items that can be traded currently are mods keys which are used for higherdifficulty content and platinum the microtransaction currency sound design the weapons and frames all sound very nice with a very mechanical gun sound on bullets with some cool scifi sounds on the energy weapons bows have a unique sound to them both realistic yet futuristic the game has very little in the way of a soundtrack relying more on drum rolls and simple beat patterns there are a couple points in the game that have music but there are only a couple tracks i would really like to see this part of the game grow as music is a huge part in the sell factor of a game and adds much needed depth to the missions and main screens player vs player this is still a relatively new facet of gaming for warframe the vast majority of gameplay centers around coop but there are currently two modes of pvp in the game the first and most accessible mode is known as conclave this features a map with obstacles and wall strewn about and is a 2v2 deathmatch as frames and weapons are ranked up and modded out they gain more conclave rating points the sum of your frame and weapons ratings creating your total conclave rating when searching for opposing players you will compete in a conclave tier with your rating or higher to ensure that newer players wont be completely facerolled the second mode is known as dueling this is a 1v1 cage match that is found in clan dojos and is used more for practice than actual combat although some clans like to use this as a method of judging ranks for players in their clans conclave being the main pvp mode is what i use for my overall pvp experience here in the review overall i found this game type to be very fun and exhilirating offering continually refreshing matches closing thoughts warframe is a solid and enjoyable game that doesnt require much money at all there is no paytowin content money definitely is a convenience especially when starting out but as a player progresses new items are easier to unlock and put less burden for money it should be noted that a player can only store 2 warframes and 8 weapons without paying platinum for extra slots but platinum can be earned in game by trading upgraded or rare mods to other players who want them platinum itself is relatively cheap requiring a modest amount of money that is often up for discount simply by logging into the game getting 20% coupons are really common with 50% and 75% coupons less so but still present de puts out an enormous amount of content for this game with a new weapon or two coming out every couple weeks and a new frame every month or two along with harder to find prime variants that have boosted stats these are more for bragging rights and lateend game than anything else they are taking this game on the right track and it continues to grow and evolve with a company that takes careful feedback from its player base early game play can get repetitive but trust me when i say that sticking through the early grind blossoms into a fantastic mid to late game and more content being released all the time players that have questions will find that getting answers is really easy as the community is easy to talk to and the game has a rich wiki warframewikiacom that has a crew that works all the time to keep it up to date with a rapidly evolving game overall score as of update 1201 8510 stunning visuals refreshing take on shooters unique progression systemspecializations amazing community amazing dev team almost nonexistent soundtrack early game can get quite repetitive lore needs more development this is becoming less of an issue with each successive patch

this game made me stab my eyeballs out and then shove them down my throat as i slowly tore my limbs off and stored them inside of my ribcage
not recommended
what is warframe well to put it bluntly its a game about space ninjasthats really it a bunch of traumatized space ninjas were forcibly put in some other dimension which is about as close to hell as reality gets most of them died and those who didnt became some of the most twisted dangerous creatures ever made to contain their power and their deformed bodies theyre encased in war frames which also help boost their powers sosuper hero space ninjasthats warframe the silly concept aside the game is actually pretty good i cannot imagine starting this game completely on my own the learning curve is pretty darned steep and i luckily had an experienced playercronxyx help me out and get started now in terms of graphics and computer stress this game does require a lot of it even at half resolution my computers not too happy about it and im playing on the lowest possible settings if you have an underpar computer which has trouble running games like csgo id not bother with this one itll be unplayable for you in terms of controls and mechanics the game can be fun but also very very annoying and itll most likely make your wrists hurt if you dont sit just right this applies mostly to melee combat though which is my chosen favoritewhy make a game about space ninjas if they can just pull out a space rifle and shoot things i have a samurai sword that sparks lightning at my hip damned right ill use it for example when going into melee mode your left mouse button is no longer attack but is held down to provide an energy draining power boost to your swings increasing damageand making you look super cool glowy and stuff while the e key becomes the new attack button meanwhile stamina and fatigue is incredibly scarce in this game granted how much movement you need to be doing thus many people have taken to the art of floor skatingyou sprint by holding down shift and in order to slide along the floor doing sparks and stuff you have to hold down ctrl at the same time and for an added boost you push e to make a forward dash slice attack to cover even more groundif done right you can cross an entire map instantlyand probably kill yourself as you fall into a pit when you do this over and over and over and over for hours youll find your left wrist is burning and slightly swollen so my advice is to tilt your keyboard slightly to the left since the arrow keys are useless here youll only be using the left side of your keyboard and your mouse however despite the hand breaking controls the demanding graphics and the kinda silly conceptspace ninjas hua hiah the game is tremendously fun and quite addicting the satisfying hack and slash and realistic ragdolling and the steep learning curve makes becoming good at this game a legitimate achievementi meanim still rank 0 and ive failed my rankup test 3 times nowps once you get ready to take the test make sure you are in the right warframeonce you have the option to take the test if you click no itll give you the cooldown anyway \  these rank up tests can only be attempted once a day24 hours so best be prepared before doing them my advice considering this games free yes id definitely give it a try ive played it for 2 days and am quite hooked thanks to cronxyx for introducing me to this game youre the best horsie a kitty could ask for <3

with a combat system a blend of mass effect and resistance and graphics a generation ahead of most other free to play titles youd expect this game to be good and yes for a free to play game it is but its not as good as the games it steals sometimes shamelessly from its everywhere in the game from the sliver of a storyline that exists to the weapons to the combat mechanics its unoriginal and not as good as the sources warframe takes inspiration from now im all for taking a great concept from another game and making it even better but its never been better the combat system is directly comparative to mass effect and while warframe has tried to move away from it even the ui used to be a dead steal from mass effect but again not as good excellent for a free title perhaps but the developer of warframe does not exactly lack the funding to make original content and thats my main issue with warframe they cant its like making a ww2 game called medal of duty or call of honor and branding it as something unique when digital entertainment the developer release a patch it tends to break the game after 2  years and 15 major updates although an inspiring amount you would think they would be able to at least check their own code before unleashing it on the main audience but something always breaks usually in spectacular ways a patch goes live to rebalance a warframe class and it breaks the matchmaking system sending you into a singleplayer game and the online chat into a singleplayer experience as well how or why the coding for a warframe has anything to do with the ingame chat system nobody knows rebalancing the game usually goes the same way as patches usually it fails and often in spectacular ways no matter if its your class your weapons or the enemies you use them on of course there is a forum for suggestions but unless complaints are voiced in the hundreds or more it goes largely ignored but i digress warframe is at its core a good game an original idea it never was and dont let anyone fool you there but a good game especially for a free to play title it does have a healthy view of what an ingame cashshop should be like and you never need to look at it to enjoy any aspect of the game sadly it is managed by a team of people who does not understand coding or game designing properly to maintain their original vision of what warframe should have been there are flaws in this game that have been flaws since warframe went live but that have never been solved to the point where one might wonder if they lost the original sourcecode somewhere along the way play this on a casual level if you are into free to play titles but dont waste your money on it from a design point of view warframe was always a mess and 15 updates later it is only worse than where it started

the throne of my favorite game ever something about it keeps me from burning out on it but then again minecraft did that for a while to and i havent played it in months so i may burn out on it but i dont see it happening in the near future the game is free to play and when people hear or see a free to play game they are afraid of it because of pay to win games the great thing about this game is some of the best weapons in the game are only achievable through gameplay alone while still giving people good incentive to pay the game looks and although it took me a while to get used to controls great my computer not the beefiest in the world and warframe can still keep a good fps maybe some lag if alot of things are happening or i have a bunch of other programs running in the background but overall lag free on my average powered computer i5 another thing that could draw people in is the mostly coop multiplayer when i first ran tf2 i got killed over and over by people much much better than me warframe is a mainly coop multiplayer meaning that if a n00b you may feel like a noob when you see your scores compared to others but dont have to worry about the same things as in competitive games and if you like there are still conflicts and dueling arenas where pvp is possible the amount of content is amazing how this game runs on my computer is amazing and the awesome devs keep adding recommended
this third person shooter regardless if its free or not is one of the best i have ever played for the following reasons first the pricing model is very fair as nearly everything can be obtained for free the way it works is that as you go out in missions you will obtain resoruces which can be used for building items second the devs are extremly dedicated to thier game warframe has gone along way since i played in august of 2013 there has been so many additions made such as the entire reworking of the melee system or being able to control portions of the solar system with your clanaliance upcomming additions include new environments and a reputation system with other factions third is the community of this game this out of other online games has one of the best communities nearly everone is friendly and helpful the two clans i have joined are laidback and fun almost everyone is willing to tag along with you on missions as everyone benefits in some way fourth which is the most important is the core gameplay what third person shooter allows you wallrun slide shoot and pull of destructive powers the movement is at most part fluid and fast besides some of the parkour the controls are easy to pick up but can be difficult to master as you can pull of complex moves with proper timing and button combinations however in no way shape or form is this game tatical it more of a crazy action game that is very quick this game can also get very difficult like you will be surrounded by over 2 dozen enemies and knocked down at the same time it is better to tag along with a group but solo play is good if you are looking for a challenge just make sure your weapons are leveled up finally is the overall presentation of the game the art style is really good and some of the characters and weapons look really cool from an artistic perspective on the technical side the game is mostly well optimised and at low settings which i am running at and even than it looks great the use of motion blur has been improved a bit an option for adaptive vsync has helped in reducing the tearing and studering however every game does have its flaws and warframe is no exception this game does have quite abit of bugs not bf4 bad but it does have it fair share of bugs for instance sometimes the limbs of dead enemies would randomly stretch out for a few seconds sometimes the difficulty randomly spikes on certain missions finally the game can be pretty unforgiving for new players as the game doesnt hold your hand after the short tutorial on a side note this is for ps4 users only the updates come much later than the pc version which the devs should work out with sony also the game can be abit of a grind at times overall warframe is a great game and the fact it is this level of quality at open beta means that the game will get progressivly better as time goes on note this is my first review so feel free to give me feedback in the comments section but please keep it constructive and polite

what is warframe introduction warframe is a freetoplay third person shooter scifi game with some sort of an alien theme incorporated into itthis game has one of the best variety of content even in comparison to some other games some that arent even f2ps well what do i exactly mean by that lets find out likes it has a large selection of warframes to choose from warframes are exoskeleton suits that grants the user four different skills to choose from each warframe has its own unique abilities however  dont let that fool you as for the fact that the skill mechanics might seem a little similar skills are of course extremely satisfying to play around with unique & distinctive weapons options with a huge arsenal at your disposal the weapons in this game will definitely provide an endless amount of fun the movement mechanic in warframe is also very special and distinctive any player is able to perform acrobatic feats traveling from room to room in mere seconds dislikes unfortunately the developers of warframe seem to have quite some pricy microtransaction schemes in mind though some people might not agree that this is a pay to win title an undeniable fact is that warframe indirectly forces the player to purchase credits or otherwise known as platinum in order to have a much enjoyable experience based on the fact that a player starts off with 2 warframe slots out of a total of 24 warframes and a couple of weapon slots ridiculous weapon customization options weapons and warframes in the game are enhanced in many different ways with the use of modification cards these cards take up points and the game only allows up to 60 points to be expendable on a single warframeweapon well itll be 30 if you dont have at least 20 platinum missions in warframes are reptitive and downright distasteful unfortunately its either going around killing everyone in the house saving a hostage or defending a stationary artifact conclusion all in all warframe is a great coop game it will be right up your alley if you are looking for a third person shooter fastpaced and adrenaline style fun however if you dont like microtransactions meaning that you dont wish to spend any money on digital ingame items & repetitive content then id suggest you steer clear away from this game & dont even think of touching it with a ten foot pole verdict 710 a good coop shooter that can be enjoyed by all a cautious recommendation because of microtransaction features in it

with ninja jumps wall running sliding flip kick hammer attacks bows shotguns assault rifles and each frame has 4 abilitys invisibilityaoe healaoe disarmaoe stunchargeknockdownaoe deathmelee attack boostdotsteleportsdeployable shields the game exists in the perma open beta like dungeon defenders did for 2 years and like every game released now does so they have the excuse hey its only beta for comicall game inballance and garbage skills its totally free to play and you can acsess all content totally free but it will take you a few months there are currently 13 warframes to unlock and 31 weapons you can unlock them by farming the bluprints farming materials and spending 34 days crafting or spending 10 pounds for each frame and 39 pounds for weapons you start with a choice of 3 frames
