this game is fun amazingly so but it has its cons too one of the facts that i love so much about this game is that most of the features are really unique like you can buy a lot of stuff for platinum premium credits but you can get platinum without having to spend a cent got a rare mod or items sell them in the trading section for platinum that you can use and trade however you wish the leveling system is fun as well there are 2 types of levels weapon and character levels and there are also mastery ranks basically the difference is that mastery rank can only climb in xp there are 17 of them and each more different than the last but how you get xp is unique as well you get 100 mastery xp from leveling up your weapon and 200 for leveling up your warframe and when you have enough for a level up you face a master rank challenge that differs each time first killing with primary weapon within time limit then kill with secondary then with melee then here come the fun part the fourth is hacking consoles withing the time limit it is a sort of minigame within the game you can do to reset alerts the the fifth is sharpshooting shooting assigned targets within the time limit weapons level ups dont make you weapon stronger but it gives 1 mod capacity per level at the maximum of 30 levels but you can use a orokin catalyst or a orokin reactor to double the mod capacity to 60 in game term this is called poatoing due to the shape of them changing your mods can drastically improve you weapons from adding elemental damage to increasing damage to adding clip size total amunition or increasing fire rate the mods for warframes are different they give plus shield capacity plus health and buffs such as those but also they can give things such as loot and enemy radars make a shockwave from your feet when you jump from high up and land but also the adition of aura mods are available for warframes and melee weapons aura mods give extra mod capicity and grants you bonuses such as energy regen or health regen some give gun damage or extra health or extra ammo polarities are basically types of mods if you match a mod polarity with a weapon or a warframe polarity it only costs half if you mismatch the polarities it costs 1 or 2 more aura mods give double plus in mod capicity if matched with the right polarity forma you can use on max level weapons or frames to reset their level to level 0 but it does not make it any more powerful instead you can alter one slot to what ever polarity you want making you ale to fit more powerful mods on it now enough of this pros lets talk cons this game is glitchy and sometimes has poor ai i have seen it time and time again where an enemy is hiding behind a wall and wont do anything unless you are standing in their faces this game is unbelievably grindy when you have played it much even as little as i have you start to have a plethora of resources i have like 60000 of everything common that drops in packages of 200300 and i have up to 150 of the rarest resources the game counters that with argon crystals to get argon crystals you must first grind for a key that randomly drops in survival or defence misions then you must do the mission the key opens and hope you get an extra rare resource i have done 4 of these missions with loot radar and not get 1 of them so finally you got an argon crystal but surprise it disappears from your inventory after 24 hours and some require to have 3 of these things so for the most powerful and most grindy weapon out there the dragon nikana you had to farm for 75 oxium which you could only get by defeating specific flying enemies called oxium osprey oh and here is the catch if you shoot them they suicide bomb you and you get no drops try to use melee and they fly away so after weeks of grinding for oxium you need to have 1 forma as well forma blueprints are found as a login reward or in special alert missions and making it takes 1 of every ultra rare resource morphics gallium neural sensors and 24 hours to wait oh and did i mention the 3 argon crystal that are required as well so finally you got your nikana but to upgrade that to the dragon nikana you need to have 1 argon crystal another 75 oxium and the mastery rank of 8 that takes a long time so you can grind and grind and grind for hours but you cant keep using your same weapons or else you wont get any mastery rank ups i didnt figure this out so i spent 70 hours without switching weapons so i am only in mastery rank 6 now

this review is split into sections using numerals to show each section my rating all in all i would rate it an 810 would recommend if you can deal with a decent amount of grinding and some bugs also this game is still in beta i the game modes are exterminate eliminate all enemies mobile defense taking a datamass to a control panel then defending it defense defending something for 5 waves at a time survival survive a mass onslaught of enemies for as long as possible rewards every 10 minutes excavate defend and keep a scanner and its excavators powered to extract resources interception you capture and defend several points from being taken over by enemies sabotage destroy a reactor assassinate all boss missions and to kill high valued targets and hijack defend a mobile target and possibly destroy it the game is 100% coop unless you go to the pvp player versus player areas graphics are good gameplay is very grindy sometimes buggy and very well balanced bugs well crap ii the game is grind worthy grinding through many missions to progress is slightly boring but considering that each mission is never the same in the sense that they will always look different from the last time you played it all weapons can be op if you mod then properly and you obtain mods from trading other players rewards from missions or by defeating enemies there are warframes which is basically your suit with magical powers that are very destructive against enemies there are 300ish missions and more than 10 different planetsmoons with 10 or more missions each with their matching environmental art styles each warframe has their own special four abilities unique to that warframe warframes abilities range from being able to turn invisible to being able to stomp the ground and suspend all the enemies in the air to shooting spikes into every enemy within your sights the weapons in game can range from a jet power hammer to a pistol that shoots rockets to a gun that shoots circular blades or bolts the lore is very simple and easy to remember there are three main factions the grineer that are a bunch of brain washed clones the corpus that probably are like humans and the infested that are infested creatures of doom there is an enemy called the stalker that rarely shows up if a boss curses you and then there are the g3 and zanuka that do the same thing you have these syndicates that are 6 different groups you sign up with one and then you trade this thing called standing for a mod that boosts your warframes abilities or a weapon or something else the basic 300 missions are the normal missions then there are void missions and derelict missions void missions come in 4 tiers each increasing tier number indicates increasing difficulty there is a void boss called corrupted vor he comes around just as rarely as the stalker does but only in the void derelict are basically the tier 3 and 4 but only with infested enemies also customization of your warframeweapons is pretty good you can change every color to whatever you want and same for additional cosmetics credits are the basic currency in the game orokin ducats are prime pieces rewards from void missions traded for special currency to be traded for primed modscosmetics and the premium currency platinum platinum can be earned by the login rewards by trading rare modsprime components or by purchasing them archwing i have not done too much of this yet as such i am unable to give 100% valid information afaik as far as i know you have a jetpack and fly through space and continue your basic objectives and you can go fast just like sonic the hedgehog this is mainly unfinished structure added into the game there have been several alerts in game using this game type but it remains with little content iii alerts one of the best ways of acquiring rare modsitems is through dailyspecial alerts there are daily alerts that often reward with only credits or a few resources but sometimes they have a rare mod or weapon as a reward sometimes rare resources normally a weapon or some high cost item would be reward from a tactical alert rarely some type of cosmetic items tactical alerts are long and tedious alerts that last a week or so in which the player needs to complete a very hard challenge in order to obtain said items the tactical alerts are mainly for experienced players who are looking for challenge iv raids raids are very hard in my opinion much more difficult than tactical alerts they offer a rare arcane item and require a massive amount of teamwork there currently is only one raid in the game it has several team based puzzleschallenges which works well with 8 player squads in the end you face off a very easy to kill boss as long as you dont die my rating all in all i would rate it an 810 would recommend if you can deal with much grindingsome bugs absolute nonsense

this story requires a bit of setup last year a friend of mine whom id known from gaming for a long time contacted me and told me about this great new game that was in beta that he was backing as a founder called a grandmaster ingame called warframe a third person cooperative shooter with elements of phantasy star onlinediablo loot runs procedurally generated levels and more content being added all the time the game was difficult to start as there are many keys for various secret parkour maneuvers running along walls sliding down ziplines soon i was completely hooked my friend and i were playing late into the night trying to grind out just one more piece necessary to build a new component or weapon or trying to beat our best time on the survival missions  where you fend off an ever growing wave of foes as life support ticks down over the year there were many great victories hair raising last second escapes and new friends joining our little group many hours were spent joking around with each other on skype cracking jokes blasting weird songs at each other and coming up with our own stupid little catchphrases flash forward a year warframe now has space combat new warframes new weapons and new combat controls the game still has its original style but its so much improved last week our four player regular team developed some incredible strategies that let us get further than we ever had on wave defense missions the only thing that made us stop was getting tired on tuesday my friend who invited me to the game a year ago didnt show up that night i found out on wednesday that he had passed away suddenly from an undiagnosed health condition the shock of it is still hitting us hard the friendships that we had formed through the game gone in an instant it hardly feels real i keep expecting him to log in and be there ready to do another defense mission and its difficult to accept that well be going it alone now we contacted digital extremes the company that makes the game and asked if there was anything we could do they dedicated their 11202014 episode of their webcast to the memory of our friend and read our memorials to him on the air their reactions were heartfelt and touching they really do listen to and react to the community i not only recommend the game for how much fun it is i recommend you play it with a group of friends on voice chat  up to four per session your gameplay experience may vary alone and form a clan or join one just because many items are clanonly i recommend it for how responsive the game developers are to the community they constantly improve it and add new content items and weapons there is a storyline that is unfolding the voice acting is delightful you could easily play this game without spending a single dollar of real world currency on it real world currency is used for cosmetics and increasing the number of warframes and weapons you can own or buying things that you cant wait for thanks digital extremes and rest in peace woxit

 update 24414 it has been a fairly significant chunk of time since i wrote this review of warframe and some elements of the game have been expanded upon in ways that alleviate some of the issues i originally had the premium currency platinum can now be traded between players this provides an option for players who do not wish to put money into the game but want to participate in using the storefront users in the comments have pointed out that there are many powerful items which are not available in the store  if you want them youll need to grind multiple new game modes exist including invasion a mode which allows players to team up together with the corpus or the grineer to work against the opposing faction this mode gives the player some agency in the kinds of rewards he receives for completing the mission the latest update introduced melee 20 which delivered improvements to the games melee combat the most interesting update comes in the form of dark sectors clans and alliances can own parts of the solar system and can fight for that contested ownership clans and alliances can also set tax and resource requirements on anyone who accesses their conquered territories leading to territorial battles for supremacy in conclusion a decent amount of content has been added to the game while the core argument of my review holds true warframe is finally approaching the level of depth required to elevate itself above a mere grinding game the new eve onlineesque sector mechanics are particularly promising in that regard   original review 251113 a greatlooking initially interesting game that feels like one compelling part of what should be a greater whole warframe is an interesting entry in the free to play space it has the looks and the gameplay but after a while it begins to feel lacking in the way of substance gameplay largely involves clearing your way through various missions types as you progress in rank leveling up your weapons and your warframe the games metaphor for various classes each having their own unique abilities advantages disadvantages and so on as you shoot a myriad of alien grineer infested hordes and corpus robots missions range from rescue scenarios where a hostage must be located and escorted to safety to mobile defense missions where waves of increasingly difficult enemies must be held off as you protect a moving objective these can all be completed solo but are made more interesting by grouping up with other players higher level missions are tricky by yourself making teaming up the more attractive proposition weapons and warframes can be augmented with various modifcations that apply the standard action rpg fare  elemental damage bonuses increased critical hit damage faster reload speeds you name it this allows for some diversity in gameplay between players where you may opt to build out your warframe in a more supportive role or stock up on mods which provide a more tanky character so far the game has been well supported with semiregular content updates and special events usually in the form of new warframes and weapons and a community effort in which everyone can participate the only issue is that the game is a bit of a grind in fact its a complete grinding game the main reason for going on missions is in the hopes of accumulating various materials with which to craft the new warframes or weapons you can use the games premium currency to expedite the process of manufacturing said items which take hours days of real time to craft or simply buy them outright from a storefront why do you want these new weapons and warframes to grind more efficiently for materials this might strike you as a monotonous loop and to an extent it is but the joy of the gameplay itself goes a way to allievating the game from being a total bore inevitably though you may become tired of the treadmill the game sometimes feels like it is skirting the boundaries of being gross about its free to play nature  you can certainly get almost everything in the game without spending if youre willing to commit to the grind but it can sometimes feel like game systems are designed to encourage you to give up and bring out your wallet  namely the sheer amount of materials required to craft better equipment and the time spent waiting for these items to actually be built its always questionable when a f2p game includes a long timer alongside a button to make it go away for just a few pounds ultimately if youre just looking for a good looking nice playing third person shooter with online components and a decent aesthetic you can do far worse than warframe after spending some time with it however you might wind up wishing there was a little more to the experience beyond what is currently available

before you read into this review let me ask you one question do you think fun is the most important thing in any game if you answered yes stick around and keep reading if you answered no you probably wouldnt like warframe warframe gets a lot of flak for being repetative but i personally feel that the reviewers who complain about the gameplay being repetative are failing to see the bigger picture warframe is not about a deep gripping narrartive or memorable characters its about action fun and pretty crazy weapon variety and to top it all off everything that impacts gameplay can be obtained for free warframe is a very specialized game focused on action flare and fun and boy oh boy does warframe nail action and fun with over a dozen unique warframespowersuits used by the player each with their own unique abilities and stats to choose from youre sure to find one that you really enjoy playing as and then theres the weapons oh boy the weapons this game has almost every kind of scifi weapon i can think of we have small scale particle cannons beefy sniper rifles plasma casters living weapons that shoot everything from electricity to streams of deadly viruses an insanely powerful rocket launcher a grenade launcher with remote detonation powerful bows a gun that shoots spinning saw blades and of course the obligatory pewpew assualt rifles to ease new players into the experience oh but thats just the primaries in every mission you will have the option to carry a primary a secondary and a melee but you can choose to carry only 1 or 2 if you please the secondaries include but are not limited to living weapons that shoot corrosive darts and poison gas a goo gun that shoots sticky globs of acid that eat right through armor 2 deadly hand cannons one of which shoots many metal balls in a shotgun spread while the other shoots a spread of radiation blasts miniature plasma casters rapid fire dual pistols a spreadrocket launcher that they somehow compressed into the size of a pistol a pistol that shoots bolts that can pin enemies to walls deadly and accurate burst fire pistols pocket snipers revolvers a lever action beast throwing knives throwing stars and a standard semiauto pistol to ease new players in and then theres my favorite weapon class the melee weve got greatswords that can hit numerous enemies in a wide arc more conservative longswords that swing fast and allow better mobility while attacking dual daggers which generate an incredibly fast flurry of slashes and stabs whips for when you want the range of a greatsword but the mobility of a longsword theres also the polearms heavy axes heavy hammers rocket hammer and even the thrown melee weapons useful for killing at a distance while conserving ammo and for stealth kills more recently digital extremes added in 2 katanas and a set of claws that pop out of your arms like wolverine melee has become much more prominent lately now that de has completely revamped it no longer do you simply mash or hold e now you can perform different combos that require different inputs these combos are assigned to stance mods that you can apply to your weapon each melee weapon class i mentioned above has at least 1 stance mod and each mod comes with its own unique combos that are useful for different purposes and situations my favorites are the katanas with decisive judgement as the stance i use it to make my tenno look and fight like vergil from devil may cry 3 so yes warframe can seem repetative to some people but not to me i greatly enjoy the vast arsenal that is placed before me and i truly believe that these tools of destruction make up for the lack of deep narrative that said i thoroughly recommend warframe to anyone who likes shooters or character action games or anyone who likes having fun

ninjas play free those are the three words i wont forget for a very long time having first began playing warframe at the beginning of open beta back when there were a handful of tilesets the ui was simplistic and generally the game felt so much smaller at some point i grew disillusioned with the game and left it for atleast an entire year looking back now its great to see how much it has grown i returned only a week ago but there is still much work to be done  the title of beta becomes readily apparent when you realise digital extremes has a multitude of undocumented changes and nerfs in their hotfixes as well as glitches and imbalances between many of the titular frames but it is however a thirdperson shooting hackyslashy parkour ninja simulator and one of my favourite games of all time for its intuitive fastpaced and fluid combat which flows brilliantly as one switches from oversized machinegun to pocket laser shotgun to jetpowered hammer the most important question is however is it fun well it certainly has its flaws for newer players itll be an uphill struggle since you wont be all too familiar with it youll have to really farm for some of your gear and sometimes rngesus will kick you in the balls there are some annoying enemies too like grineer manics who zip around and teleport constantly or nullifiers who remove your warframes buffs when you enter their shields my answer yes play this bloody game give it a chance  after all digital extremes had this baby from the getgo this is what darksector was supposed to be

let me start by saying that this is a free game that has in game purchases weapons warframes storage slots etc let me continue with this is one of the best games i have ever played in my life i am an avid gamer for more than 18 years now and have played hundreds of games of all genres this free game is mindblowing in many ways 1 it is free 2 it is not that kind of a free game where someone who makes in game purchases will have an enourmous advantage over you the advantage is only in the fact that he will have more warframes and wapons because storage is limited and you can purchase more you level at the same speed the prime warframes are only 1015% better then the normal ones same goes for prime weapons 3 the game does not require you to pay to get 100% out of it you can aquire all weapons and all warframes including prime by earning them through playing 4 the graphics are brilliant a beautifully designed game 5 playability is 150% at least for me love the mechanics love the skillsets love the weapons for a free game you could not wish for more 6 robot ninjas with superpowers enough said 7 awsome mod skilltree simillar to rpg style but here you collect mods upgrade them and fit them into your warframes weapons and companions little robots with laser beams killer hounds and simmilar the best thing is you need to pick different mods for different misions because they are very specialized there is no best mod for all missions and against all types of enemies there are a few drawbacks 1 the lore story is somewhat shallow altough it is so far very well thought of 2 the missions tend to be somewhat repetitive but using different warframes weapons and playing with different coop players makes it interesting time and time again 3 that is all i can currently think of all in all this is a must try game i have personally invested over 300 hours in it and i havent had enough cheers

warframes to use in battle and new gameplay expeirences overall pretty sure they make new graphics improvements as well warframe is a great looking game that is constantly trying to evolve itself the hammers bows assult rifles axes whips and much more each of these are leveled up and can be modded for increased effect same goes for the warframes themselves imo this is there warframe hooks people noticeable compared to the addictive cycle of leveling up fighting obtianing new equipment and leveling up again what story is there i do enjoy and i believe digital extremes keeps giving little tid bits of story to progress the game the game play is fun but after a while it gets old for most people i do know some have kept at the cycle for a while and have came up with some very impressive builds but i dont see myself doing that good thing is that theres still plenty of gameplay to be had for us more casual players all in all i dont regret the money or time i spent on the game but the cycle is something that needs to be pointed out

ive been playing this game for about two weeks and my impression so far is mixed though mostly positive if you like the concept of being a space ninja and dont mind the grinding that goes with most mmos then this game is for you so far im still relatively inexperienced and avoid the trading channel like the plague honestly while a community market is always a plus the sheer wall of text of stuff you dont care about is hard to sift through in order to find people sellingbuying the stuff you do care about also the game seems to suffer from a diablostyle you need this gear on this class otherwise dont bother me mentality when it comes to highlevel missions perhaps its a spoiled community or perhaps its the apathy that comes with farming i cant say apart from these two glaring communitybased problems id say the game is superb there are occasional bugs falling through the map not being able to interact with the ui but they can be worked around as a f2p it blasts its competitors out of the water holding its own against similar aaa titles the weapons are varied and most are suited for specific occasions and playstyles like to snipe there are sniper rifles and compound bows like mowing down enemies with a hail of bullets try the soma wanna get up close and personal i cant recommend the valkyr frame highly enough as her ultimate ability renders her invulnerable with the only drawback being a restriction to melee attacks which regenerate her health want to customize your frame there are several mods which alter your abilities as well as paint and accessory customization options at your disposal my recommendation for people looking to try this game  download it give it a whirl its free to play so its not like youll be missing out on anything by trying it i recommend starting with the excalibur warframe as it turns out quite handy even in later missions there are lots of weapons and mods that were only accessible for certain events but a lot of them are often sold on the player market most of the gear youll need can be won through ingame missions though it may take a significant amount of time for those of you who dont mind spending a bit of extra cash platinum will be your best friend in quickly acquiring equipment which would normally take days of grinding to find for those of you whod rather keep your cash and play entirely free youll spend a lot of time trying to farm specific areas for parts to craft your new toys but itll be that much more satisfying once you have them i cant recommend this game highly enough it has its flaws sure but for what started as an indie freetoplay its come a long way the game is still regularly updated the devs are usually quick to fix major bugs and you can finally live the dream of becoming space rambo whats not to love

warframe warframe ive spent alot of hours playing this game and i can safely say that its extremely funny like many other games warframe is far from perfect but its unique coop style combat and generally its concept makes it stand out while i could go on a talk about every aspect of the game ill try to keep it short pros enjoyable farm for me atleast i have never farmed in a single game to give you an idea i used to sell my extra epics in vanilla wow just to take flight paths i think this could illustrate that i really didnt farm i can vouch that warframe farming has another element to it maybe because the combat its fun great combat warframe is a great 3rd person action shooter you can also inflict pain by using melee weapons multiple weapons there are literally about 200 different weapons in the game at the moment all of them which you can purchase from the store with in game cash aka credits which are easily acquired or for other weapons farm the components different types of missions which all have specific goals if you dont like a mission type and dont really need anything from it its pretty straightforward do not do it pvp while unbalanced its still really funny and by no means mandatory it can be seen as another type of mission great coop game if not the best ive played i wont compare it with games such as broforce or castlecrashers cons  and i really hate saying that  zero endgame if you ever get to farm all of the frames and weapons you want max them etc well theres really no one to use them on the tower 4 missions are considered to be the lategame even there you have to wait 40mins or 40waves in order to get somewhat of a challenge and if the whole group is skilled you will have to wait even more bugs game is not filled with but has some bugs which grow tiresome after a while most common would be having an enemy that goes underground and you having no chance of killing him if you dont have some sort of rocket launcher or spell that will hit anything close unbalanced like pretty much every other game warframe sense of balance is broken out of the 200 weapons i mentionned above well they are pretty much all useless except of course the small list of guns that are completely op compared to their brethren about 15 maybe 20 guns masteryrank while i really liked that system it proved to be nothing else but numbers rising after reaching mr 8 you can have every weapon i think aside from that well its not really rewarding to level up you have to constantly craft new weapons and level them up being myself rank 11 i surely like seeing the number but i feel like theres no much more to it future orientation of course i do not know where the game is headed but i started playing somewhere in july the developpers where already saying that endgame would be included ive seen some cool reworks being done new aspects of the game being created new missions that are about space combat however end game has still not been included storywise while warframe does seem to have a story line we know very little about it which is a shame as i even downloaded a really crappy game to get an idea of wf story the game was dark sector friendly advice  do not download dark sector chat system & ui i dont even know where to begin with noob unfriendly fortunately for me i started out the game with alot of friends and we already had friends which were high leveled and everything was explained if i were to startout this game alone i probably would have seen only the first planet conclusion even though the cons are important the game is still awesome and kicks  i really hope the developers realize that they have a great game and that they could easily make it one of the best games with the addition of minimal stuff really i really recommend this game 810 yeah

warframe is not without its shortcomings with regards to skillgap balance and friendliness to novice players but its also hugely entertaining de have absolutely nailed that just one more mission loop when you find a group of players who work as a team or just a friendly player to partner up with for story missions it can be absolutely thrilling survival missions where each teammember works to help others while fending off wave after wave of enemies is a total rush when you pull off some impossible feat of swordgunbased acrobatics it is gratifying like few other games on the other hand there is a considerable skillgap get beyond the initial public missions and you will often find people playing the game at a level of skill and speed that renders novice players little more than a burden there are also a baffling amount of systems and upgrade trees to navigate upgrades have upgrades theres definitely a part of me that likes the fact that in a lot of ways its very unabashedly hardcore but i would certainly caution new players that it requires a level of dedication they might not be willing to give but if you like the sound of spaceninjas pulling off improbable feats of death acrobatics against hordes of enemies that look like they were the product of tsutomu niheis fever dreams and youre prepared to put in the hours to learn how to master the games myriad systems then i totally recommend you pick this up and spend a few bucks in the store addendum for those worried about the f2p aspect spending a bit of money will save you a lot of pain and grind but you can absolutely play this game and have a thoroughly good time without spending a penny it is not a paytowin scenario

recommended
i have recently discovered warframe but ive been completely hooked ever since if you are uncertain what this game is supposed to be its very much like an mmorpg in a lot of respects but missions are played with teams of 4 you do have your farming grinding and classes for example but warframe does a lot of things differently and i really like all these differences with more traditional mmos for example the combat has some parkour thrown into it it has hordes and hordes of enemies you have to lay waste to and with the abilities the characters aka warframes have you can freshen up the gameplay just by picking another weapon or frame which is another great thing about this game there are plenty of completely viable yet different weapons and warframes and you can easily switch between the ones you have whenever you are not in a mission and all weapons can be farmed for fair and square there is not pay to win there another thing is that instead of having a world with npcs and quests warframe has a solar map you can use to instantly select the mission you want to play that means less meaningless questing to keep you busy and more tothepoint farming for what you need to me that keeps the game meaningful although this means less story and possibly less immersion it does prevent having to do boring backtracking and fetching quests just to progress in the questline you are just transported to the action instantly and as soon as it ends you are back in your ship and ready for more action never a dull moment but of course this game is free to play and we all know how bad that can be in the case of warframe id say the pay to play is fair enough but it could be better for example there is no way to get extra slots for warframes and weapons besides using the paid currency platinum and youll absolutely need that space in order to play the game now i know a few players who havent spent a penny and still managed to get the platinum by trading with other players but with the current trading system that requires immense effort and is very very frustrating the trade chat is a mess and trading requires you to memorize the parts you have try and keep up with tradechat and then heading to a special place in order to exchange a maximum of 4 items per trade its needlessly complicated so i spend around 5 bucks a month in order to get my slots and potatoes which is quite reasonable considering the sheer amount of updates this game receives but be aware that actually playing for free will be limiting and frustrating which brings me to point three the updates the reason i spend 5 bucks a month is that in return the game gets updated incredibly often in order to keep veteran players interested it is necessary to release all sorts of timelimited offers for rare loot events for rarer loot expensive timelimited hardtoget endgame content and updates with new warframes and weapons so warframe gets tons of updates from the devs and frequent updates are the core of a lively community and that brings me to another positive point about this game the community and the devs digital extremes de for short is legendary besides giving frequent content updates de keeps in touch with their community through wellwatched streams on twitch every single week one on thursday for fun and giggles and one on friday where they talk about everything de is working on this transparency is why de is very liked by the community the streams give you a good idea of what the personal motivations of the devs is and there is a lot of respect going on between de and the players which is very good and ive never seen anything like this from a reasonably big company like de and because warframe is 100% coop i found that the community is helpful and respectful as a new player instead of being kicked out and looked down upon i was helped by more experienced players as soon as i asked a question and when i had difficulty getting a rare item random players would sometimes just give it to me so with the devs and players all being very respectful the game has a nice atmosphere going on which i enjoy so all in all my only concern with warframe is that there is some content that is locked behind a paywall the good news is that you can get around that the bad news is that its pretty hard but nonetheless the game is hugely enjoyable the community is one of the best ive seen and the game is very much alive and sprawling with content more being added almost weekly certainly worth your time id say

throughout my years of gaming ive stumbled across few games that provide such diversity and freedom we all crave the opportunity to play a game that has almost no limits well warframe for one is absolutely stunning it provides the player with the feeling of no limits even though it still has a few wich can almost not be noticed at all warframe is linear fun and dynamic even for a game nearing its last stages of beta its quite impressive the mechanics in the game had blown me away at some point as it has some originallity to it wich very few developers fail to master the gameplay itself however makes the player feel truely apart of the whole experience as it has a mixture of realism fun and fantasy with a twist of scifi it provides the ultimate game experience most games have failed at the combination of these elements the diversity of weapons is astonishing as it provides almost every weapon type imaginable and more another part of the game i enjoyed was the modding system i found it very easy to use and i also loved the diversity in mods available there really is almost endless possibilities especially with the elemental combination of mods wich forms new elements the customization also stood out for me it gives the player some nice personalization options to feel even more at one with the game or perhaps makes them feel more comfortable with their gameplay strangely enough the graphics of the game is quite a pleasureable aspect even though it gives some killer eye sores you know its all worth it in referral to the music i really enjoy the action movie feel it has to it and would love to see some more of it it truely gets you in the zone if there is one thing i could add to warframe itd be a bit of lore warframe is freetoplay and almost all in game content can be obtained by the player without having to pay a dime warframe is cooperative and provides a pve gamestyle with a few pvp elements wich are seemingly still in development and i am quite eager to see the outcome of the pvp system warframe also provides players the option to trade for platinum wich is basically only obtained from buying it with real time currency in short warframe is not a paytowin but if you feel like supporting the developers for thier great work then buying some platinum is a good way to support them but to sum it all up i strongly reccomend warframe if you are looking for something new and different and encourage some rpg fans to try it out aswell as those diehard mmo fans keep up the good work i am excited to see what comes next with the further developement of this game if i had to rate it on a scale of 1 to 10 id give it a 7610

what to say about this gameive played this for a long timea really long time way back in the beginning of its alpha and its really grown since thenthere are consistant updates that keep everything fresh and new and fastpaced third person shooting brawling that most people would be interested inbut as much as i love this game thats sort of where the bright sides end the game in its nutshellis a huge farmfest thats it you earn mastery rank basically an account level through levelling gear which unlocks missions weapons and gear for you until about rank 7 which as is expected of the community they will look at this and think how they could possible perfect this system and they haveyou farm the same mission over and over again usually either defense you have an objective to defend from oncoming waves or survival you defend yourself from oncoming waves while keeping your oxygen supply up from drops from the enemies and capsules which drop by the time youre aboutsay mastery rank 4 you will be doing the same old thing in the same place the same way and if youre not brainlessly farming xp for a warframe or weapon your farming materials to make another weaponwarframe to farm xp for them on the other hand the farming methods means you get diverse weaponry that you are forced to use instead of clinging to a single weapon like a lifeline and never leaving ituntil you realise just how bad 80% of the weapons arecome on this game has rocket hammers glaives chainsaw whips lightning throwers beamrifles quad barrelled shotguns and yetalmost non of these weapons can by used by the end with the end game rifle being the soma prime next up is warframes and what a selection you get warframes are the classes of the games and there are over 20 to choose from and their abilities differ from creating clones going beserk summoning water tentacles from the floor balls that turn into black holes etc etc but again too bad 70% of them are dwarfed in terms of useability with most highend groups refusing anyone who isnt on the good warframe list and just to prove my point should you get this gamejust count how many times you see a hydroid warframe800 hours and ive legitimately seen 3 hydroids in a game with 22 different warframes at this current time why are only 6 or 7 are viable the paying system is what youd expect from any f2p app the simple pay to make things more convinient take on it with weapons taking 12 hours to craft and warframes taking atleast 35 days to make they are nice to begin with they give you some starting platinum only about enough to pay for the cheapest warframe there is or to increase your warframeweapon slots a couple times i cant complain with it if you have the patience then you wont have to pay a penny its difficult to say how i feel about the developersyes its good that they are coming up with updates on a regular basis that theyre trying to keep things fresh but they have a horrible habit of releasing a new weapon making it overpowered so everyone will buy it and items to upgrade it then nerf it in a weeks time when everyone has got one claiming they were fixing it this wouldnt be a problem if this didnt happen consistantly over the time i played it in conclusion despite these things the gameis oddly fun even with its mindnumbing goals and sneaky tactics to part you with your money and being free to play it wouldnt hurt to try it out and there is some joy in being an overlypowerful space ninja destroying waves of space clonesmerchants or zombies ps this is simply my opinion on the game some of my knowledge on the game is slightly outdated but otherwise this should be fairly accurate

warframe warframe ive spent alot of hours playing this game and i can safely say that its extremely funny like many other games warframe is far from perfect but its unique coop style combat and generally its concept makes it stand out while i could go on a talk about every aspect of the game ill try to keep it short pros enjoyable farm for me atleast i have never farmed in a single game to give you an idea i used to sell my extra epics in vanilla wow just to take flight paths i think this could illustrate that i really didnt farm i can vouch that warframe farming has another element to it maybe because the combat its fun great combat warframe is a great 3rd person action shooter you can also inflict pain by using melee weapons multiple weapons there are literally about 200 different weapons in the game at the moment all of them which you can purchase from the store with in game cash aka credits which are easily acquired or for other weapons farm the components different types of missions which all have specific goals if you dont like a mission type and dont really need anything from it its pretty straightforward do not do it pvp while unbalanced its still really funny and by no means mandatory it can be seen as another type of mission great coop game if not the best ive played i wont compare it with games such as broforce or castlecrashers cons  and i really hate saying that  zero endgame if you ever get to farm all of the frames and weapons you want max them etc well theres really no one to use them on the tower 4 missions are considered to be the lategame even there you have to wait 40mins or 40waves in order to get somewhat of a challenge and if the whole group is skilled you will have to wait even more bugs game is not filled with but has some bugs which grow tiresome after a while most common would be having an enemy that goes underground and you having no chance of killing him if you dont have some sort of rocket launcher or spell that will hit anything close unbalanced like pretty much every other game warframe sense of balance is broken out of the 200 weapons i mentionned above well they are pretty much all useless except of course the small list of guns that are completely op compared to their brethren about 15 maybe 20 guns masteryrank while i really liked that system it proved to be nothing else but numbers rising after reaching mr 8 you can have every weapon i think aside from that well its not really rewarding to level up you have to constantly craft new weapons and level them up being myself rank 11 i surely like seeing the number but i feel like theres no much more to it future orientation of course i do not know where the game is headed but i started playing somewhere in july the developpers where already saying that endgame would be included ive seen some cool reworks being done new aspects of the game being created new missions that are about space combat however end game has still not been included storywise while warframe does seem to have a story line we know very little about it which is a shame as i even downloaded a really crappy game to get an idea of wf story the game was dark sector friendly advice  do not download dark sector chat system & ui i dont even know where to begin with noob unfriendly fortunately for me i started out the game with alot of friends and we already had friends which were high leveled and everything was explained if i were to startout this game alone i probably would have seen only the first planet conclusion even though the cons are important the game is still awesome and kicks  i really hope the developers realize that they have a great game and that they could easily make it one of the best games with the addition of minimal stuff really i really recommend this game 810 yeah

this is a real action spacebased game very recomended please read on if youre considering trying this game out its got some tips on how the game works the game itself is slightly complicated when it comes to upgrading weapons and your warframe but after a while of playing it is easy to understand despite the market frames and weapons costing platinummoney bought with real money you can get every single one of the weapons or frames by killing bossesyou do not have to do it alone or from clan researchesa clan which has the weaponwarframe you are seeking researched you buy blueprintsyou can buy them for gamemoney credits and if you farm enough compotents you start the build the building time ranges from 12hrs  24hrs depending on the weapon warframe partshelmet chassis and systems build for 12hrs and the building of a whole frame is 3 days in short everything is free yes youve heard me right every awesome weapon or warframe can be gotten for 100% free if you have the patience for it even platinum can be earned for free by selling prime weapon parts and warframe parts in the trading chat you make a deal trade in the clan dojo using the trading post this game gives you a lot of opportunities if you dont have spare money for platinum the only thing you cannot get for free are the suguratathings that dangle from melee weapons a bit of a decoration and warframe syandanascloaksscarves and warframe armorarmor for warframe customization despite this the game is worth trying out you will simply love the world the freedom in this shooter as you can fight with swords warhammers bladed frisbeesglaives sparring weapons dual daggers dual swords you got bows snipers lots of guns flame throwers laserguns crossbows nikanakatana or onehand crossbows throwing knives shurikens dual pistols onehand pistols gas pistols microwave pistols so many weapons an opportunities and then youve got modssomething that increases damage or adds an elemental damage to your weapon also increases shield and health capacity in warframes so that you can mod your weapons and warframe to adapt to your gaming type each mod can be fusioned making the effect stronger consuming fusion cores which you collect throughout the mission this just adds more great options yet the more ranked the mod the more mod capacity points it consumes in frames and weapons mod capacity increases as you level at maximum weaponframe rank you got 30 mod points you can double those by purchasing an orokin reactororokin catalyst for a mere of 20platinum but you can get free blueprints from alert missions which randomly appear at random times throughout the day you can also use formascan be bought or built more common to find forma blueprints rather than orokin reactorcatalystto change the polarities in the mod slots if the chosen polarity matches the polarity of the mod half the points are consumed pretty complicated right as you play along it will be natural for you to remember all this ask an experienced player for help if you need itjust ask in region chat thank you for taking time to read this now go ahead and try this game out

intro so ive been around since the closed beta of this gameand one thing is for sure you will hardly find any other online game that evolves as rapidly as this one and grows in size so continuouslyyou can see that the devs truly love the game and not just the money it generates the classic space ninjas theme has over the years evolved to more of a mercenary theme with many influences the game there is no good or bad there is just balance set thousands of years in the future you have just been woken up from your cryogenic sleep you are a tenno controlling one of the many warframes available to you and you basically answer to the lotus which is an organization and a person at the same time your ultimate goal would be to bring balance to the solar system againbecause fact is bringing peace is not an option rather than being a white knight in shining armor you will have to set priorities on who to fight and who to helpand your priorities can and will realign at timeseither because you want itor because the majority of tenno are willing it your tools are abilities companions guns and melee weaponry sometimes you have to kill sometimes to infiltrate or rescuebut what you do is entirely your choice long term now nothing is wrong with hopping onto a survival match for 20 minutes or just doing a few boss runs and logging off againbut you probably wonder can i invest more than a few hours what can i do in the long term and the game devs got you covered there the first and most obvious goal would probably be to try and buildaquire all weapons and characters you like and perfect themof course this is not for everyone as some pieces of gear especially for new players can feel grindy to aquire once you are a veteran this will be of no concern to you as resources come to you naturally then there are things like syndicates that you can join and run missions for to gain standing some factions even give you goals that are shared with all other tenno that upon completion grant you access to new bits of lore of the world or other rewards pvp also existsand is entirely optional but capture the cephalon flag or deathmatch tdm all exist and finally there are events and questschallenges the devs will regularly add story driven events where the entirety of the community can partakeand sometimes due to the mercenary nature of the tennowill have to split to follow the path that they think is right but do not be fooled events can actually fail not every mission is about gloryand the higher the payroll the more ruthless the enemy the cash shop the item mall is very fairas in the initial prices will look very scary until you realize that you dont have to pay for any of it and can still get it at a very acceptable pace the only thing that cant be aquired with ingame currency are some style itemsfor which you can still trade some items for premium currency to unlock it anyway additionally there is a chance to get discounts for premium currency as login bonus up to 75% and the steam packs are on sale on pretty much every big steam sale event with 50%66% discountat which point everything in the mall becomes absurdly cheap so basicallyif you are an impulse buyer that can not restrain himself at all this game might not be entirely for you but if you are a freeloader looking for a fair game or someone who either wants to do trades or only spend on games for a budget with discountsyou will do just fine here lastly developers have even pulled cash shop items from the market within very short time periods whenever something was added that the community disagreed with stronglywhich was never pay to winbut generally about taking it a little too far with style items pay to win does not exist in their cash shop pretty much only pay to sleepwhich is something you will understand once you start playing sort of a running gag the developers i can not stress this enough the developers love their game it is more than just a product to them they have livestreams every week and will directly communicate changes and content updates with the playerbaseand necessarily change it if the players dislike it this goes as far as affecting the cash shopsee above they constantly seek to improve their game and they have redone entire game systems and polished the graphics multiple times dx12 support is also announced and currently pbr physically based rendering is being implemented step by step they even did things like changing the core multiple times in hopes to imrove it 8 out of 10 times they succeedand when they failthey simply try again its that simple for them as for content they have concrete plans what they add and every 2 weeks they showcase what they are working on to players in their devstreams depending on feedback this will of course changebut thats why they do it the only thing that you cannot expectis anything to last forever in that game even core gameplay elements can still change the devs simply try to improve the game as much as they can and follow their visionwhich sometimes clashes with players opinions personal opinion i loved the game so far it is true that i went on hiatus 3 or 4 times for a month or so with this game but keep in mind that the game and all of its content except for some style items are essentially freeso you can just pick it up again whenever new content is added or they changed some game systems of course this game is not for everyone but if you want fluent combat this is yours

this story requires a bit of setup last year a friend of mine whom id known from gaming for a long time contacted me and told me about this great new game that was in beta that he was backing as a founder called a grandmaster ingame called warframe a third person cooperative shooter with elements of phantasy star onlinediablo loot runs procedurally generated levels and more content being added all the time the game was difficult to start as there are many keys for various secret parkour maneuvers running along walls sliding down ziplines soon i was completely hooked my friend and i were playing late into the night trying to grind out just one more piece necessary to build a new component or weapon or trying to beat our best time on the survival missions  where you fend off an ever growing wave of foes as life support ticks down over the year there were many great victories hair raising last second escapes and new friends joining our little group many hours were spent joking around with each other on skype cracking jokes blasting weird songs at each other and coming up with our own stupid little catchphrases flash forward a year warframe now has space combat new warframes new weapons and new combat controls the game still has its original style but its so much improved last week our four player regular team developed some incredible strategies that let us get further than we ever had on wave defense missions the only thing that made us stop was getting tired on tuesday my friend who invited me to the game a year ago didnt show up that night i found out on wednesday that he had passed away suddenly from an undiagnosed health condition the shock of it is still hitting us hard the friendships that we had formed through the game gone in an instant it hardly feels real i keep expecting him to log in and be there ready to do another defense mission and its difficult to accept that well be going it alone now we contacted digital extremes the company that makes the game and asked if there was anything we could do they dedicated their 11202014 episode of their webcast to the memory of our friend and read our memorials to him on the air their reactions were heartfelt and touching they really do listen to and react to the community i not only recommend the game for how much fun it is i recommend you play it with a group of friends on voice chat  up to four per session your gameplay experience may vary alone and form a clan or join one just because many items are clanonly i recommend it for how responsive the game developers are to the community they constantly improve it and add new content items and weapons there is a storyline that is unfolding the voice acting is delightful you could easily play this game without spending a single dollar of real world currency on it real world currency is used for cosmetics and increasing the number of warframes and weapons you can own or buying things that you cant wait for thanks digital extremes and rest in peace woxit

 update 24414 it has been a fairly significant chunk of time since i wrote this review of warframe and some elements of the game have been expanded upon in ways that alleviate some of the issues i originally had the premium currency platinum can now be traded between players this provides an option for players who do not wish to put money into the game but want to participate in using the storefront users in the comments have pointed out that there are many powerful items which are not available in the store  if you want them youll need to grind multiple new game modes exist including invasion a mode which allows players to team up together with the corpus or the grineer to work against the opposing faction this mode gives the player some agency in the kinds of rewards he receives for completing the mission the latest update introduced melee 20 which delivered improvements to the games melee combat the most interesting update comes in the form of dark sectors clans and alliances can own parts of the solar system and can fight for that contested ownership clans and alliances can also set tax and resource requirements on anyone who accesses their conquered territories leading to territorial battles for supremacy in conclusion a decent amount of content has been added to the game while the core argument of my review holds true warframe is finally approaching the level of depth required to elevate itself above a mere grinding game the new eve onlineesque sector mechanics are particularly promising in that regard   original review 251113 a greatlooking initially interesting game that feels like one compelling part of what should be a greater whole warframe is an interesting entry in the free to play space it has the looks and the gameplay but after a while it begins to feel lacking in the way of substance gameplay largely involves clearing your way through various missions types as you progress in rank leveling up your weapons and your warframe the games metaphor for various classes each having their own unique abilities advantages disadvantages and so on as you shoot a myriad of alien grineer infested hordes and corpus robots missions range from rescue scenarios where a hostage must be located and escorted to safety to mobile defense missions where waves of increasingly difficult enemies must be held off as you protect a moving objective these can all be completed solo but are made more interesting by grouping up with other players higher level missions are tricky by yourself making teaming up the more attractive proposition weapons and warframes can be augmented with various modifcations that apply the standard action rpg fare  elemental damage bonuses increased critical hit damage faster reload speeds you name it this allows for some diversity in gameplay between players where you may opt to build out your warframe in a more supportive role or stock up on mods which provide a more tanky character so far the game has been well supported with semiregular content updates and special events usually in the form of new warframes and weapons and a community effort in which everyone can participate the only issue is that the game is a bit of a grind in fact its a complete grinding game the main reason for going on missions is in the hopes of accumulating various materials with which to craft the new warframes or weapons you can use the games premium currency to expedite the process of manufacturing said items which take hours days of real time to craft or simply buy them outright from a storefront why do you want these new weapons and warframes to grind more efficiently for materials this might strike you as a monotonous loop and to an extent it is but the joy of the gameplay itself goes a way to allievating the game from being a total bore inevitably though you may become tired of the treadmill the game sometimes feels like it is skirting the boundaries of being gross about its free to play nature  you can certainly get almost everything in the game without spending if youre willing to commit to the grind but it can sometimes feel like game systems are designed to encourage you to give up and bring out your wallet  namely the sheer amount of materials required to craft better equipment and the time spent waiting for these items to actually be built its always questionable when a f2p game includes a long timer alongside a button to make it go away for just a few pounds ultimately if youre just looking for a good looking nice playing third person shooter with online components and a decent aesthetic you can do far worse than warframe after spending some time with it however you might wind up wishing there was a little more to the experience beyond what is currently available

before you read into this review let me ask you one question do you think fun is the most important thing in any game if you answered yes stick around and keep reading if you answered no you probably wouldnt like warframe warframe gets a lot of flak for being repetative but i personally feel that the reviewers who complain about the gameplay being repetative are failing to see the bigger picture warframe is not about a deep gripping narrartive or memorable characters its about action fun and pretty crazy weapon variety and to top it all off everything that impacts gameplay can be obtained for free warframe is a very specialized game focused on action flare and fun and boy oh boy does warframe nail action and fun with over a dozen unique warframespowersuits used by the player each with their own unique abilities and stats to choose from youre sure to find one that you really enjoy playing as and then theres the weapons oh boy the weapons this game has almost every kind of scifi weapon i can think of we have small scale particle cannons beefy sniper rifles plasma casters living weapons that shoot everything from electricity to streams of deadly viruses an insanely powerful rocket launcher a grenade launcher with remote detonation powerful bows a gun that shoots spinning saw blades and of course the obligatory pewpew assualt rifles to ease new players into the experience oh but thats just the primaries in every mission you will have the option to carry a primary a secondary and a melee but you can choose to carry only 1 or 2 if you please the secondaries include but are not limited to living weapons that shoot corrosive darts and poison gas a goo gun that shoots sticky globs of acid that eat right through armor 2 deadly hand cannons one of which shoots many metal balls in a shotgun spread while the other shoots a spread of radiation blasts miniature plasma casters rapid fire dual pistols a spreadrocket launcher that they somehow compressed into the size of a pistol a pistol that shoots bolts that can pin enemies to walls deadly and accurate burst fire pistols pocket snipers revolvers a lever action beast throwing knives throwing stars and a standard semiauto pistol to ease new players in and then theres my favorite weapon class the melee weve got greatswords that can hit numerous enemies in a wide arc more conservative longswords that swing fast and allow better mobility while attacking dual daggers which generate an incredibly fast flurry of slashes and stabs whips for when you want the range of a greatsword but the mobility of a longsword theres also the polearms heavy axes heavy hammers rocket hammer and even the thrown melee weapons useful for killing at a distance while conserving ammo and for stealth kills more recently digital extremes added in 2 katanas and a set of claws that pop out of your arms like wolverine melee has become much more prominent lately now that de has completely revamped it no longer do you simply mash or hold e now you can perform different combos that require different inputs these combos are assigned to stance mods that you can apply to your weapon each melee weapon class i mentioned above has at least 1 stance mod and each mod comes with its own unique combos that are useful for different purposes and situations my favorites are the katanas with decisive judgement as the stance i use it to make my tenno look and fight like vergil from devil may cry 3 so yes warframe can seem repetative to some people but not to me i greatly enjoy the vast arsenal that is placed before me and i truly believe that these tools of destruction make up for the lack of deep narrative that said i thoroughly recommend warframe to anyone who likes shooters or character action games or anyone who likes having fun

sorry for grammar btw honestly for the longest time i have had mixed feelings towards the game and sometimes question why i even play the game at all at time to start the games story is nonexistent but who cares youre a space ninja killing mobs on mobs on mobs the core component is the games combat system which is solid but also choppy at times with glitches in animations and such there are a variety of weapons ranging from a gas spraying pistol to a bone scythe which are for the most part fun to use however this is also the downfall as many weapons such as the soma that you get mid game is extremely powerful in both stat and you literally have no reason not to use it as it trumps every other assault rifle in the game currently the weapons are extremely unbalanced to the point of players using five or so weapons out of the 100 weapons the next major component of the game is frames or your character basically there is also an issue with this that is very similar to the unbalanced weapon problem some frames are simply better than others with better abilities and all not much to say about it next would have to be the enemies my god have they progressedbut in a bad way it seems the developers just got plain lazy and decided to cheese all of the enemies by buffing the hell out of them instead of improving their ai movements or things such as i dont know variety maybe you fight the same guy with a gun same alien that blows up same person with a rocket launcher fighting them will get really dull really fast for allot of people there are many other components that need discussing but for now ill end it with the good points  warframe is really addicting and will pull you back for more even if the mission seem like a pile of bs or an event that gives you a trashy weapon you always come back i cant for the life of me figure out why i suppose its like league of legends you always come back somehow the business model is also amazing platinum or paid currency in this game work allot better than about 90% of other games the prices are fair and they often give you coupons for things like 50% off your next platinum purchase the best part thought is that you dont even need to buy any in the first place everything in this game you can get buy one method or another given you have the patience and prowess to do so you can also buy parts from other players with either trades or platinum depending on what they want in conclusion the game is by no means bad but definitely not amazing either it has a ton of bugs that need fixing and the combat needs to be revised weapons and frames need buffschangesreworks in order to be viable also please if im asking to buy a max mod dont sell me a half completed mod like common man

500 hour mark with this in mind i believe i can make a accurate review this game as of now 1242014 is still a beta in process to be a story filled mmo the basis is you use a character called a warframe to runs strikes on the solar system against arguably 10 factions 3 races and 3 different sets of bounty hunters you are reffered to as tenno the people of the lotus the tenno fight foragainst others to bring balance to the system you are awakened by the lotus to prevent from being captured by the grineer to be used and processed to be their weeaponslaveresource to gain universal domination as it were for the purpose of keeping from spoiling the game ill get into this this is a mmo this is not an easy mmo if you have deep pockets and believe in buying all great gear youll be highly dissapointed because theres this thing called xp locked that keep people like you from ruining this game and speed running it to be better than everyone else in fact the entire game is genuinly 100% free minus cosmetic items like color and skins etc everything in the game minus the cosmetic items can be obtained through simply playing ingame missions give credits which are used to build bluprints to beef your arsenal up there is a achievement labeled for having 10 warframes each tool with its own purpose this is true for the game slash damage shreds fleshy enemies to pieces but sheilded ones left unphased impact bomards shields but armor shrugs it off puncture you guessed it pierces armor but does a whole lot of nothing to shields sheilds save lives all tactics should be analyzed rank up is broken down as follows xp from primarysecondarymeleewarframespooled xpmastery rank the max rank for everything is level 30 including mastery rank if you level an item to 30 you will only recieve xp that counts that first time if you use forma to level it to zero to make it stronger later the other times after the first its leveled to 30 will not count toward your mastery rank every time you hit the xp cap for a mastery rank there is a right of passage type of test to rank if you fail you will be able to try again in 24 hours if you pass then you proceed to the next rank unlocking weapons and other new items there are plenty of weapons i promise you will not run out crafting this is easier than it sounds go do a mission and collect the drops the resources currently are gallium nano spores mutagen samples mutagen mass orokin cells polymer bundle alloy plate rubedo salvage detonite ample detonite injectors fieldtron samples fieldtron oxium nav coordinates nurodes neural sensors last two are not related to each other argon crystal control modules golem nav coordnate morphics cuircuts and plastids none of these are too difficult to find all are used from time to time for different items the more you have on hand the less as much as i hate saying it farming you have to do gamplay you are a space ninja thre is no better way to describe it you do flips wallruns slides and parcour of all kinds be it rolling from a fall or vaulting to a higher spot this is your deadliest weapon each warframe has unique abilities that they use they are described in the market or abilities option in your arsenal 90% of the game is pve clan battles that you arearent apart of you may assist for funcredit earnings conclave is also available as a deathmatch for a morepersonal 1v1 or 2v2 fight as a beta this game is a 1010 nyxsilence

i figured i would rewrite my review of this game completely so allow me to start off with a bit of back story warframe is the hypothetical predocessor of des dark sector in dark sector the main character being hayden tenno is where the warframes in the game get their faction name of tenno hypothetically speaking in this universe the reason why the tenno are they way they are is for the same reason why hayden is the way he is we are human beings that had been infected by the technocyte in a positive way opposite to that of the infested where parts of the body if not all of the body have been turned to metal than gifted by the lotus one of the main protagonists in the game a suit of armor known as a warframe to fit the contores of our infection pros this game is free to play 1 not pay to win there is a real money currency known as platinum that can be used to purchase in game items down to weapons warframes and cosmetics such as accessories and colour pallets however because this game is not entirely pvp oriented as much as it is pve you need not worry about getting bulldozed by every wallet warrior out there and their cousin ______________________________________________________________________________ 2 on pvp to pve there are particular nodes specifically made just for pvp and they are few and far between each planet has 1 pvp node known as a dark sector these dark sectors are where different clans have at it with each other in order to control parts of the universe if one particular clan owns a dark sector they have the ability to determine the tax on the planet for all resources and credits earned by the players while participating on the objective of said dark sector _______________________________________________________________________________ 3 clans pretty much everyone can own one and it does not cost real money currency as a matter of fact for the lack of time it takes to create your dojo the way you want it and the time spent waiting for it to be comepleted its 100% free _______________________________________________________________________________ 4 dojos one of the best perks to owning a clan is building your own dojo now like i said in the above technically speaking it is free for the lack of time and materials you will have to farm for to do this however once you own your clan and start to build your own dojo you have the freedom to make it as big as you want with no extra cost in real money currency all it takes is the time youre willing to put into it _______________________________________________________________________________ the above were my favorite points to the game in which i have added explanations the rest ill just leave as points _______________________________________________________________________________ 5 there is a multitude of weapons warframes accessories to choose from _______________________________________________________________________________ 6 different planets with missions set at different levels enemies do not level with you _______________________________________________________________________________ 7 constant updates and hotfixes to the game de has done well to keep the players in the loop as well keep good customer service _______________________________________________________________________________ 8 freedom of movement this game has one of the best parkour systems ive found yet in a video game behind assassins creed that is _______________________________________________________________________________ 9 very smooth 3rd person shooting action with the mixture of smart movement you have the ability to lunge forward and shoot slide and shoot wall run and shoot slide and slice jump and slice or slam and wall run and slice _______________________________________________________________________________ 10 the community is an alright one obviously each have their fair share of trolls within the game on warframes region chat however most questions are answered and if not in game always on the forums in a timely manner as well with an active wiki _______________________________________________________________________________ 11  _______________________________________________________________________________ cons i am not awake enough to continue thinking on this review so in time i will come back with more information
